trans-unit.source: patchControlPoints number of control points per patch.
trans-unit.target: patchControlPoints 每个修补程序的控制点数。

trans-unit.source: patchControlPointsmust be greater than zero and less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxTessellationPatchSize
trans-unit.target: patchControlPoints 必须大于零且小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxTessellationPatchSize

trans-unit.source: pfnAllocation is a pointer to an application-defined memory allocation function of type PFN_vkAllocationFunction.
trans-unit.target: pfnAllocation 是指向类型为PFN_vkAllocationFunction的应用程序定义的内存分配函数的指针。

trans-unit.source: pfnAllocationmust be a pointer to a valid user-defined PFN_vkAllocationFunction
trans-unit.target: pfnAllocation 必须是指向有效的用户定义PFN_vkAllocationFunction的指针

trans-unit.source: pfnFree is a pointer to an application-defined memory free function of type PFN_vkFreeFunction.
trans-unit.target: pfnFree 是指向类型为PFN_vkFreeFunction的应用程序定义的无内存功能的指针。

trans-unit.source: pfnFreemust be a pointer to a valid user-defined PFN_vkFreeFunction
trans-unit.target: pfnFree 必须是指向有效的用户定义PFN_vkFreeFunction的指针

trans-unit.source: pfnInternalAllocation is a pointer to an application-defined function that is called by the implementation when the implementation makes internal allocations, and it is of type PFN_vkInternalAllocationNotification.
trans-unit.target: pfnInternalAllocation 是一个指向应用程序定义的函数的指针，该实现在实现进行内部分配时由实现调用，其类型为PFN_vkInternalAllocationNotification。

trans-unit.source: pfnInternalFree is a pointer to an application-defined function that is called by the implementation when the implementation frees internal allocations, and it is of type PFN_vkInternalFreeNotification.
trans-unit.target: pfnInternalFree 是指向应用程序定义的函数的指针，当实现释放内部分配时，实现会调用该函数，并且类型为PFN_vkInternalFreeNotification。

trans-unit.source: pfnReallocation is a pointer to an application-defined memory reallocation function of type PFN_vkReallocationFunction.
trans-unit.target: pfnReallocation 是指向类型为PFN_vkReallocationFunction的应用程序定义的内存重新分配函数的指针。

trans-unit.source: pfnReallocationmust be a pointer to a valid user-defined PFN_vkReallocationFunction
trans-unit.target: pfnReallocation 必须是指向有效的用户定义PFN_vkReallocationFunction的指针

trans-unit.source: pfnReallocationmust follow the same rules for return values as PFN_vkAllocationFunction.
trans-unit.target: pfnReallocation 必须遵循同样的返回值的规则 PFN_vkAllocationFunction 。

trans-unit.source: pfnReallocationmust return an allocation with enough space for size bytes, and the contents of the original allocation from bytes zero to min(original size, new size) - 1 must be preserved in the returned allocation. If size is larger than the old size, the contents of the additional space are undefined. If satisfying these requirements involves creating a new allocation, then the old allocation should be freed.
trans-unit.target: pfnReallocation 必须返回一个具有足够空间用于 size 字节的分配，并且原始分配的内容从字节0到最小值（原始大小，新大小）-1 必须保留在返回的分配中。如果 size 大于旧大小，则附加空间的内容未定义。如果满足这些要求涉及创建新分配，则应释放旧分配。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the handle to the device to query.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是要查询的设备的句柄。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the handle to the physical device whose properties will be queried.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是要查询其属性的物理设备的句柄。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the physical device from which to query the format properties.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是从中查询格式属性的物理设备。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the physical device from which to query the image capabilities.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是从中查询映像功能的物理设备。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the physical device from which to query the sparse image capabilities.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是从中查询稀疏映像功能的物理设备。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the physical device from which to query the supported features.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是从中查询支持的功能的物理设备。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevice is the physical device that will be queried.
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 是将要查询的物理设备。

trans-unit.source: physicalDevicemust be a valid VkPhysicalDevice handle
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 必须是有效的 VkPhysicalDevice 句柄

trans-unit.source: physicalDevicemust be one of the device handles returned from a call to vkEnumeratePhysicalDevices (see Physical Device Enumeration).
trans-unit.target: physicalDevice 必须是对 vkEnumeratePhysicalDevices 的调用返回的设备句柄之一（请参阅Physical Device Enumeration）。

trans-unit.source: pipeline is the handle of the pipeline to destroy.
trans-unit.target: pipeline 是要破坏的管道的句柄。

trans-unit.source: pipeline is the pipeline to be bound.
trans-unit.target: pipeline 是要绑定的管道。

trans-unit.source: pipelinemust be a valid VkPipeline handle
trans-unit.target: pipeline 必须是有效的 VkPipeline 句柄

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPoint is a VkPipelineBindPoint indicating whether the descriptors will be used by graphics pipelines or compute pipelines. There is a separate set of bind points for each of graphics and compute, so binding one does not disturb the other.
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 是一个VkPipelineBindPoint，它指示描述符是由图形管线还是由计算管线使用。每个图形和计算都有一组单独的绑定点，因此绑定一个不会干扰另一个。

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPoint is a VkPipelineBindPoint value specifying whether this is a compute or graphics subpass. Currently, only graphics subpasses are supported.
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 是一个VkPipelineBindPoint值，指定这是计算还是图形子过程。当前，仅支持图形子通道。

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPoint is a VkPipelineBindPoint value specifying whether to bind to the compute or graphics bind point. Binding one does not disturb the other.
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 是一个VkPipelineBindPoint值，用于指定是绑定到计算绑定点还是图形绑定点。绑定一个不会干扰另一个。

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPointmust be VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 必须为 VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_GRAPHICS

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPointmust be a valid VkPipelineBindPoint value
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 必须是有效的VkPipelineBindPoint值

trans-unit.source: pipelineBindPointmust be supported by the commandBuffer’s parent VkCommandPool’s queue family
trans-unit.target: pipelineBindPoint 必须由 commandBuffer 的父 VkCommandPool 的队列系列支持pipelineBindPoint

trans-unit.source: pipelineCache is either VK_NULL_HANDLE, indicating that pipeline caching is disabled; or the handle of a valid pipeline cache object, in which case use of that cache is enabled for the duration of the command.
trans-unit.target: pipelineCache 是VK_NULL_HANDLE，指示禁用了管道缓存；或有效管道缓存对象的句柄，在这种情况下，将在命令期间启用该缓存的使用。

trans-unit.source: pipelineCache is the handle of the pipeline cache to destroy.
trans-unit.target: pipelineCache 是要销毁的管道缓存的句柄。

trans-unit.source: pipelineCache is the pipeline cache to retrieve data from.
trans-unit.target: pipelineCache 是从中检索数据的管道缓存。

trans-unit.source: pipelineCachemust be a valid VkPipelineCache handle
trans-unit.target: pipelineCache 必须是有效的 VkPipelineCache 句柄

trans-unit.source: pipelineCachemust have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: pipelineCache 必须已从 device 创建，分配或检索

trans-unit.source: pipelineCacheUUID is an array of size VK_UUID_SIZE, containing 8-bit values that represent a universally unique identifier for the device.
trans-unit.target: pipelineCacheUUID 是大小为 VK_UUID_SIZE 的数组，其中包含8位值，这些值代表设备的通用唯一标识符。

trans-unit.source: pipelineLayout is the pipeline layout to destroy.
trans-unit.target: pipelineLayout 是要销毁的管道布局。

trans-unit.source: pipelineStage is one of the VkPipelineStageFlagBits, specifying a stage of the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: pipelineStage 是VkPipelineStageFlagBits之一，指定了管道的阶段。

trans-unit.source: pipelineStagemust be a valid VkPipelineStageFlagBits value
trans-unit.target: pipelineStage 必须是有效的VkPipelineStageFlagBits值

trans-unit.source: pipelineStatistics is a bitmask of VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits specifying the set of pipeline statistics that can be counted by an active query in the primary command buffer when this secondary command buffer is executed. If this value includes a given bit, then this command buffer can be executed whether the primary command buffer has a pipeline statistics query active that includes this bit or not. If this value excludes a given bit, then the active pipeline statistics query must not be from a query pool that counts that statistic.
trans-unit.target: pipelineStatistics 是一个位掩码VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits指定的一组管道统计可以由有源的查询在主命令缓冲区执行该次级命令缓冲区时被计数。如果此值包括给定的位，则无论主命令缓冲区是否激活了包含该位的管道统计信息查询，都可以执行此命令缓冲区。如果此值不包括给定的位，那么主动管道统计查询必须不能从查询池才是最重要的那个统计。

trans-unit.source: pipelineStatistics is a bitmask of VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits specifying which counters will be returned in queries on the new pool, as described below in html/vkspec.html#queries-pipestats.
trans-unit.target: pipelineStatistics 是VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定在新池的查询中将返回哪些计数器，如以下html / vkspec.html＃queries-pipestats中所述。

trans-unit.source: pipelineStatistics is ignored if queryType is not VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS.
trans-unit.target: pipelineStatistics 如果忽略 queryType 是不 VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS 。

trans-unit.source: pipelineStatisticsQuery indicates whether the pipeline statistics queries are supported. If this feature is not enabled, queries of type VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICScannot be created, and none of the VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits bits can be set in the pipelineStatistics member of the VkQueryPoolCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: pipelineStatisticsQuery 指示是否支持管道统计信息查询。如果未启用此功能，类型的查询 VK_QUERY_TYPE_PIPELINE_STATISTICS 不能被创建，并且没有任何的VkQueryPipelineStatisticFlagBits位可以在被设置 pipelineStatistics 所述的构件 VkQueryPoolCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: pointSizeGranularity is the granularity of supported point sizes. Not all point sizes in the range defined by pointSizeRange are supported. This limit specifies the granularity (or increment) between successive supported point sizes.
trans-unit.target: pointSizeGranularity 是支持的点大小的粒度。并非支持在 pointSizeRange 定义的范围内的所有点大小。此限制指定了连续支持的点大小之间的粒度（或增量）。

trans-unit.source: pointSizeRange[2] is the range [minimum,maximum] of supported sizes for points. Values written to variables decorated with the PointSize built-in decoration are clamped to this range.
trans-unit.target: pointSizeRange [2]是点支持的大小范围[ minimum ， maximum ]。写入用 PointSize 内置修饰符修饰的变量的值被限制在此范围内。

trans-unit.source: polygonMode is the triangle rendering mode. See VkPolygonMode.
trans-unit.target: polygonMode 是三角形渲染模式。参见VkPolygonMode。

trans-unit.source: polygonModemust be a valid VkPolygonMode value
trans-unit.target: polygonMode 必须是有效的VkPolygonMode值

trans-unit.source: poolSizeCount is the number of elements in pPoolSizes.
trans-unit.target: poolSizeCount 是pPoolSizes中的元素 pPoolSizes 。

trans-unit.source: poolSizeCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: poolSizeCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: ppData points to a pointer in which is returned a host-accessible pointer to the beginning of the mapped range. This pointer minus offsetmust be aligned to at least VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::minMemoryMapAlignment.
trans-unit.target: ppData 指向一个指针，在该指针中返回了主机可访问的指向映射范围开头的指针。该指针减去 offset 必须至少与 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: minMemoryMapAlignment 对齐。

trans-unit.source: ppDatamust be a pointer to a pointer
trans-unit.target: ppData 必须是指向指针的指针

trans-unit.source: ppEnabledExtensionNames is a pointer to an array of enabledExtensionCount null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of extensions to enable for the created device. See the Extensions section for further details.
trans-unit.target: ppEnabledExtensionNames 是指向以null结束的 enabledExtensionCount 字符串的数组的指针，该字符串包含要为创建的设备启用的扩展名。有关更多详细信息，请参见扩展部分。

trans-unit.source: ppEnabledExtensionNames is a pointer to an array of enabledExtensionCount null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of extensions to enable.
trans-unit.target: ppEnabledExtensionNames 是指向以null终止的 enabledExtensionCount 字符串数组的指针，该字符串包含要启用的扩展名。

trans-unit.source: ppEnabledLayerNames is a pointer to an array of enabledLayerCount null-terminated UTF-8 strings containing the names of layers to enable for the created instance. See the Layers section for further details.
trans-unit.target: ppEnabledLayerNames 是一个指向以null终止的 enabledLayerCount 的UTF-8字符串数组的指针，该字符串包含要为创建的实例启用的层的名称。有关更多详细信息，请参见“ 层”部分。

trans-unit.source: ppEnabledLayerNames is deprecated and ignored. See Device Layer Deprecation.
trans-unit.target: ppEnabledLayerNames 已弃用并忽略。请参阅设备层弃用。

trans-unit.source: preserveAttachmentCount is the number of preserved attachments.
trans-unit.target: preserveAttachmentCount 是保留的附件数。

trans-unit.source: primitiveRestartEnable controls whether a special vertex index value is treated as restarting the assembly of primitives. This enable only applies to indexed draws (vkCmdDrawIndexed and vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect), and the special index value is either 0xFFFFFFFF when the indexType parameter of vkCmdBindIndexBuffer is equal to VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT32, or 0xFFFF when indexType is equal to VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT16. Primitive restart is not allowed for “list” topologies.
trans-unit.target: primitiveRestartEnable 控制是否将特殊的顶点索引值视为重新启动图元的组装。该使能仅适用于索引绘制（vkCmdDrawIndexed和vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect），和特别指数值是为0xFFFFFFFF当 indexType 的参数 vkCmdBindIndexBuffer 等于 VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT32 ，或为0xFFFF时 indexType 等于 VK_INDEX_TYPE_UINT16 。“列表”拓扑不允许原始重启。

trans-unit.source: propertyFlags is a bitmask of VkMemoryPropertyFlagBits of properties for this memory type.
trans-unit.target: propertyFlags 是此内存类型的属性的VkMemoryPropertyFlagBits的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: pushConstantRangeCount is the number of push constant ranges included in the pipeline layout.
trans-unit.target: pushConstantRangeCount 是管道布局中包含的推送常数范围的数量。

trans-unit.source: query is the query index within the query pool that will contain the results.
trans-unit.target: query 是查询池中将包含结果的查询索引。

trans-unit.source: query is the query index within the query pool where the result is stored.
trans-unit.target: query 是存储结果的查询池中的查询索引。

trans-unit.source: query is the query within the query pool that will contain the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: query 是查询池中将包含时间戳的查询。

trans-unit.source: querymust be less than the number of queries in queryPool
trans-unit.target: query 必须小于 queryPool 中的查询数量

trans-unit.source: queryCount is the number of queries managed by the pool.
trans-unit.target: queryCount 是池管理的查询数。

trans-unit.source: queryCount is the number of queries to reset.
trans-unit.target: queryCount 是要重置的查询数。

trans-unit.source: queryCount is the number of queries. firstQuery and queryCount together define a range of queries.
trans-unit.target: queryCount 是查询数。 firstQuery 和 queryCount 一起定义查询范围。

trans-unit.source: queryCount is the number of queries. firstQuery and queryCount together define a range of queries. For pipeline statistics queries, each query index in the pool contains one integer value for each bit that is enabled in VkQueryPoolCreateInfo::pipelineStatistics when the pool is created.
trans-unit.target: queryCount 是查询数。 firstQuery 和 queryCount 一起定义查询范围。对于管道统计信息查询，池中的每个查询索引对于创建该池时在VkQueryPoolCreateInfo :: pipelineStatistics 中启用的每个位包含一个整数值。

trans-unit.source: queryFlags indicates the query flags that can be used by an active occlusion query in the primary command buffer when this secondary command buffer is executed. If this value includes the VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT bit, then the active query can return boolean results or actual sample counts. If this bit is not set, then the active query must not use the VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT bit.
trans-unit.target: queryFlags 表明查询标志可以通过有源遮挡查询在主命令缓冲区执行该次级命令缓冲区时使用。如果此值包括 VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT 位，则活动查询可以返回布尔结果或实际样本计数。如果未设置此位，则主动查询必须不使用 VK_QUERY_CONTROL_PRECISE_BIT 位。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the handle of the query pool managing the queries being reset.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是查询池的句柄，用于管理要重置的查询。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the query pool managing the queries containing the desired results.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是查询池，用于管理包含所需结果的查询。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the query pool that is managing the results of the query.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是用于管理查询结果的查询池。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the query pool that will manage the results of the query.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是将管理查询结果的查询池。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the query pool that will manage the timestamp.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是将管理时间戳的查询池。

trans-unit.source: queryPool is the query pool to destroy.
trans-unit.target: queryPool 是要销毁的查询池。

trans-unit.source: queryPoolmust be a valid VkQueryPool handle
trans-unit.target: queryPool 必须是有效的 VkQueryPool 句柄

trans-unit.source: queryPoolmust have been created with a queryType of VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP
trans-unit.target: queryPool 必须已使用 queryType 的 VK_QUERY_TYPE_TIMESTAMP 创建

trans-unit.source: queryPoolmust have been created with a queryType that differs from that of any other queries that have been made active, and are currently still active within commandBuffer
trans-unit.target: queryPool 必须已经与创建 queryType 是从已经作出的任何其他查询的不同活跃，并且目前仍然有效内 commandBuffer

trans-unit.source: queryPoolmust have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: queryPool 必须已从 device 创建，分配或检索到

trans-unit.source: queryType is a VkQueryType value specifying the type of queries managed by the pool.
trans-unit.target: queryType 是VkQueryType值，用于指定池管理的查询类型。

trans-unit.source: queryTypemust be a valid VkQueryType value
trans-unit.target: queryType 必须是有效的VkQueryType值

trans-unit.source: queue is the queue on which to wait.
trans-unit.target: queue 是要等待的队列。

trans-unit.source: queue is the queue that the command buffers will be submitted to.
trans-unit.target: queue 是命令缓冲区将提交到的队列。

trans-unit.source: queue is the queue that the sparse binding operations will be submitted to.
trans-unit.target: queue 是稀疏绑定操作将提交到的队列。

trans-unit.source: queuemust be a valid VkQueue handle
trans-unit.target: queue 必须是有效的 VkQueue 句柄

trans-unit.source: queueCount is an unsigned integer specifying the number of queues to create in the queue family indicated by queueFamilyIndex.
trans-unit.target: queueCount 是一个无符号整数，指定在 queueFamilyIndex 指示的队列族中要创建的队列数。

trans-unit.source: queueCount is the unsigned integer count of queues in this queue family.
trans-unit.target: queueCount 是此队列系列中队列的无符号整数计数。

trans-unit.source: queueCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: queueCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: queueCountmust be less than or equal to the queueCount member of the VkQueueFamilyProperties structure, as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties in the pQueueFamilyProperties[queueFamilyIndex]
trans-unit.target: queueCount 必须小于或等于该 queueCount 所述的构件 VkQueueFamilyProperties 结构，如通过返回 vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties 在 pQueueFamilyProperties [ queueFamilyIndex ]

trans-unit.source: queueCreateInfoCount is the unsigned integer size of the pQueueCreateInfos array. Refer to the Queue Creation section below for further details.
trans-unit.target: queueCreateInfoCount 是 pQueueCreateInfos 数组的无符号整数大小。有关更多详细信息，请参阅下面的“ 队列创建”部分。

trans-unit.source: queueCreateInfoCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: queueCreateInfoCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndex designates a queue family as described in section Queue Family Properties. All command buffers allocated from this command pool must be submitted on queues from the same queue family.
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 指定队列族，如“ 队列族属性”一节中所述。从此命令池分配的所有命令缓冲区必须在同一队列族的队列中提交。

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndex is an unsigned integer indicating the index of the queue family to create on this device. This index corresponds to the index of an element of the pQueueFamilyProperties array that was returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties.
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 是一个无符号整数，指示要在此设备上创建的队列系列的索引。该指数对应于所述的一个元素的索引 pQueueFamilyProperties ，是由返回的数组 vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties 。

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndex is the index of the queue family to which the queue belongs.
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 是队列所属的队列族的索引。

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndexmust be less than pQueueFamilyPropertyCount returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 必须小于 pQueueFamilyPropertyCount 返回的 vkGetPhysicalDeviceQueueFamilyProperties

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndexmust be one of the queue family indices specified when device was created, via the VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo structure
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 必须是创建 device 时通过 VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo 结构指定的队列系列索引之一

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndexmust be the index of a queue family available in the calling command’s device parameter
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndex 必须是调用命令的 device 参数中可用的队列系列的索引

trans-unit.source: queueFamilyIndexCount is the number of entries in the pQueueFamilyIndices array.
trans-unit.target: queueFamilyIndexCount 是 pQueueFamilyIndices 数组中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: queueFlags is a bitmask of VkQueueFlagBits indicating capabilities of the queues in this queue family.
trans-unit.target: queueFlags 是位掩码VkQueueFlagBits表明在此队列中的家庭队列的能力。

trans-unit.source: queueIndex is the index within this queue family of the queue to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: queueIndex 是此队列队列家族中要检索的索引。

trans-unit.source: queueIndexmust be less than the number of queues created for the specified queue family index when device was created, via the queueCount member of the VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo structure
trans-unit.target: queueIndex 必须小于用于当指定队列家族索引创建队列的数目 device 的创建，通过 queueCount 所述的构件 VkDeviceQueueCreateInfo 结构

trans-unit.source: r is a VkComponentSwizzle specifying the component value placed in the R component of the output vector.
trans-unit.target: r 是VkComponentSwizzle，指定放置在输出矢量的R分量中的分量值。

trans-unit.source: rmust be a valid VkComponentSwizzle value
trans-unit.target: r 必须是有效的VkComponentSwizzle值

trans-unit.source: range is a size in bytes of the buffer view. If range is equal to VK_WHOLE_SIZE, the range from offset to the end of the buffer is used. If VK_WHOLE_SIZE is used and the remaining size of the buffer is not a multiple of the element size of format, then the nearest smaller multiple is used.
trans-unit.target: range 是缓冲区视图的大小（以字节为单位）。如果 range 等于 VK_WHOLE_SIZE ，则使用从 offset 到缓冲区末尾的范围。如果使用 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 且缓冲区的剩余大小不是 format 元素大小的倍数，则使用最接近的较小倍数。

trans-unit.source: range is the size in bytes that is used for this descriptor update, or VK_WHOLE_SIZE to use the range from offset to the end of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: range 是用于此描述符更新的字节大小，或者是 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 以使用从 offset 到缓冲区末尾的范围的大小。

trans-unit.source: rangeCount is the number of image subresource range structures in pRanges.
trans-unit.target: rangeCount 是pRanges中图像子资源范围结构的 pRanges 。

trans-unit.source: rangeCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: rangeCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: rasterizationSamples is a VkSampleCountFlagBits specifying the number of samples per pixel used in rasterization.
trans-unit.target: rasterizationSamples 是一个VkSampleCountFlagBits，用于指定光栅化中使用的每个像素的样本数。

trans-unit.source: rasterizationSamplesmust be a valid VkSampleCountFlagBits value
trans-unit.target: rasterizationSamples 必须是有效的VkSampleCountFlagBits值

trans-unit.source: rasterizerDiscardEnable controls whether primitives are discarded immediately before the rasterization stage.
trans-unit.target: rasterizerDiscardEnable 控制是否在光栅化阶段之前立即丢弃基元。

trans-unit.source: rect is the two-dimensional region to be cleared.
trans-unit.target: rect 是要清除的二维区域。

trans-unit.source: rectCount is the number of entries in the pRects array.
trans-unit.target: rectCount 是 pRects 数组中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: rectCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: rectCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: reference is an integer reference value that is used in the unsigned stencil comparison.
trans-unit.target: reference 是在无符号模板比较中使用的整数参考值。

trans-unit.source: reference is the new value to use as the stencil reference value.
trans-unit.target: reference 是用作模板参考值的新值。

trans-unit.source: regionCount is the number of regions to blit.
trans-unit.target: regionCount 是要模糊处理的区域数。

trans-unit.source: regionCount is the number of regions to copy.
trans-unit.target: regionCount 是要复制的区域数。

trans-unit.source: regionCount is the number of regions to resolve.
trans-unit.target: regionCount 是要解析的区域数。

trans-unit.source: regionCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: regionCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: renderArea is the render area that is affected by the render pass instance, and is described in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: renderArea 是受渲染过程实例影响的渲染区域，下面将对其进行详细描述。

trans-unit.source: renderArea is the render area that is affected by the render pass instance. The effects of attachment load, store and multisample resolve operations are restricted to the pixels whose x and y coordinates fall within the render area on all attachments. The render area extends to all layers of framebuffer. The application must ensure (using scissor if necessary) that all rendering is contained within the render area, otherwise the pixels outside of the render area become undefined and shader side effects may occur for fragments outside the render area. The render area must be contained within the framebuffer dimensions.
trans-unit.target: renderArea 是受渲染过程实例影响的渲染区域。附件加载，存储和多重采样解析操作的效果仅限于其x和y坐标落在所有附件的渲染区域内的像素。渲染区域扩展到 framebuffer 的所有层。应用程序必须确保（如有必要，使用剪刀）所有渲染都包含在渲染区域内，否则渲染区域外部的像素将变得不确定，并且渲染区域外部的片段可能会发生着色器副作用。渲染区域必须包含在帧缓冲区尺寸内。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is a VkRenderPass object defining which render passes the VkCommandBuffer will be compatible with and can be executed within. If the VkCommandBuffer will not be executed within a render pass instance, renderPass is ignored.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是一个 VkRenderPass 对象，用于定义 VkCommandBuffer 将与之兼容并可以在其中执行的渲染传递。如果 VkCommandBuffer 不会在渲染过程实例内执行， renderPass 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is a handle to a render pass object describing the environment in which the pipeline will be used; the pipeline must only be used with an instance of any render pass compatible with the one provided. See Render Pass Compatibility for more information.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是渲染通道对象的句柄，该对象描述将在其中使用管道的环境；管道必须只能用任何一种情况下使用的渲染过程所提供的一个兼容。有关更多信息，请参见渲染通道兼容性。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is a handle to a render pass.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是渲染过程的句柄。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is a render pass that defines what render passes the framebuffer will be compatible with. See Render Pass Compatibility for details.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是一个渲染过程，它定义了帧缓冲区将与哪些渲染过程兼容。有关详细信息，请参见渲染通道兼容性。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is the handle of the render pass to destroy.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是要销毁的渲染通道的句柄。

trans-unit.source: renderPass is the render pass to begin an instance of.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 是开始其实例的渲染过程。

trans-unit.source: renderPassmust be compatible with the renderPass member of the VkFramebufferCreateInfo structure specified when creating framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: renderPass 必须是兼容与 renderPass 所述的构件 VkFramebufferCreateInfo 创建时指定结构 framebuffer 。

trans-unit.source: renderPassmust be a valid VkRenderPass handle
trans-unit.target: renderPass 必须是有效的 VkRenderPass 句柄

trans-unit.source: renderPassmust have been created, allocated, or retrieved from device
trans-unit.target: renderPass 必须已创建，分配或从 device 检索renderPass

trans-unit.source: residencyAlignedMipSize is VK_TRUE if images with mip level dimensions that are not integer multiples of the corresponding dimensions of the sparse image block may be placed in the mip tail. If this property is not reported, only mip levels with dimensions smaller than the imageGranularity member of the VkSparseImageFormatProperties structure will be placed in the mip tail. If this property is reported the implementation is allowed to return VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_ALIGNED_MIP_SIZE_BIT in the flags member of VkSparseImageFormatProperties, indicating that mip level dimensions that are not integer multiples of the corresponding dimensions of the sparse image block will be placed in the mip tail.
trans-unit.target: residencyAlignedMipSize 是 VK_TRUE 如果与mip级别尺寸不在整数稀疏图像块的相应尺寸的整数倍的图像可以被放置在MIP尾巴。如果未报告此属性，则只 imageGranularity 尺寸小于 VkSparseImageFormatProperties 结构的imageGranularity成员的Mip级别放置在Mip尾部。如果报告了此属性，则允许实现在 VK_SPARSE_IMAGE_FORMAT_ALIGNED_MIP_SIZE_BIT 的 flags 成员中 VkSparseImageFormatProperties ，指示不是稀疏图像块相应尺寸整数倍的mip级别尺寸将放置在mip尾部。

trans-unit.source: residencyNonResidentStrict specifies whether the physical device can consistently access non-resident regions of a resource. If this property is VK_TRUE, access to non-resident regions of resources will be guaranteed to return values as if the resource were populated with 0; writes to non-resident regions will be discarded.
trans-unit.target: residencyNonResidentStrict 指定是否将物理设备可以对资源的持续获得非居民的区域。如果此属性为 VK_TRUE ，则将确保对资源的非驻留区域的访问返回值，就像该资源填充了0一样；对非居民区的写入将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: residencyStandard2DBlockShape is VK_TRUE if the physical device will access all single-sample 2D sparse resources using the standard sparse image block shapes (based on image format), as described in the Standard Sparse Image Block Shapes (Single Sample) table. If this property is not supported the value returned in the imageGranularity member of the VkSparseImageFormatProperties structure for single-sample 2D images is not required to match the standard sparse image block dimensions listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: residencyStandard2DBlockShape 是 VK_TRUE 如果物理设备将访问使用标准稀疏图像块的形状（基于图像格式）所有的单样品2D稀疏资源，如在所描述的标准稀疏图像块形状（单个样品）表。如果此属性不支持在返回的值 imageGranularity 所述的构件 VkSparseImageFormatProperties 结构单样本的2D图像并不需要以匹配表中所列的标准稀疏图像块尺寸。

trans-unit.source: residencyStandard2DMultisampleBlockShape is VK_TRUE if the physical device will access all multisample 2D sparse resources using the standard sparse image block shapes (based on image format), as described in the Standard Sparse Image Block Shapes (MSAA) table. If this property is not supported, the value returned in the imageGranularity member of the VkSparseImageFormatProperties structure for multisample 2D images is not required to match the standard sparse image block dimensions listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: residencyStandard2DMultisampleBlockShape 是 VK_TRUE 如果物理设备将使用标准的稀疏图像块的形状（基于图像格式）访问所有多重采样2D稀疏资源，如在所描述的标准稀疏图像块形状（MSAA）表。如果不支持该性质，在返回的值 imageGranularity 所述的构件 VkSparseImageFormatProperties 结构为多重采样2D图像并不需要以匹配表中所列的标准稀疏图像块尺寸。

trans-unit.source: residencyStandard3DBlockShape is VK_TRUE if the physical device will access all 3D sparse resources using the standard sparse image block shapes (based on image format), as described in the Standard Sparse Image Block Shapes (Single Sample) table. If this property is not supported, the value returned in the imageGranularity member of the VkSparseImageFormatProperties structure for 3D images is not required to match the standard sparse image block dimensions listed in the table.
trans-unit.target: residencyStandard3DBlockShape 是 VK_TRUE 如果物理设备将使用标准的稀疏图像块的形状（基于图像格式）访问所有三维稀疏资源，如在所描述的标准稀疏图像块形状（单个样品）表。如果不支持该性质，在返回的值 imageGranularity 所述的构件 VkSparseImageFormatProperties 结构用于3D图像并不需要以匹配表中所列的标准稀疏图像块尺寸。

trans-unit.source: resourceOffset is the offset into the resource.
trans-unit.target: resourceOffset 是资源的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: resourceOffsetmust be less than the size of the resource
trans-unit.target: resourceOffset 必须小于资源的大小

trans-unit.source: robustBufferAccess indicates that accesses to buffers are bounds-checked against the range of the buffer descriptor (as determined by VkDescriptorBufferInfo::range, VkBufferViewCreateInfo::range, or the size of the buffer). Out of bounds accesses must not cause application termination, and the effects of shader loads, stores, and atomics must conform to an implementation-dependent behavior as described below.
trans-unit.target: robustBufferAccess 指示已根据缓冲区描述符的范围（由 VkDescriptorBufferInfo :: range ， VkBufferViewCreateInfo :: range 或缓冲区的大小确定）对缓冲区的访问进行边界检查。超出范围的访问必须不会导致应用程序终止，并且着色器加载，存储和原子的影响必须符合如下所述的依赖于实现的行为。

trans-unit.source: rowPitch describes the number of bytes between each row of texels in an image.
trans-unit.target: rowPitch 描述图像中每行纹理像素之间的字节数。

trans-unit.target: sType 是此结构的类型。

trans-unit.source: sampleCounts is a bitmask of VkSampleCountFlagBits specifying all the supported sample counts for this image as described below.
trans-unit.target: sampleCounts 是一个位掩码VkSampleCountFlagBits指定所有支持的样本计数为这个图象描述如下。

trans-unit.source: sampleRateShading indicates whether per-sample shading and multisample interpolation are supported. If this feature is not enabled, the sampleShadingEnable member of the VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo structure must be set to VK_FALSE and the minSampleShading member is ignored. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the SampleRateShading capability.
trans-unit.target: sampleRateShading 指示是否支持按样本着色和多样本插值。如果未启用此功能， sampleShadingEnable 的成员 VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo 结构必须被设置为 VK_FALSE 和 minSampleShading 成员被忽略。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 SampleRateShading 功能。

trans-unit.source: sampleShadingEnable specifies that fragment shading executes per-sample if VK_TRUE, or per-fragment if VK_FALSE, as described in Sample Shading.
trans-unit.target: sampleShadingEnable 指定对每个样品片段着色执行如果 VK_TRUE ，或每个片段如果 VK_FALSE ，如在样品着色。

trans-unit.source: sampledImageColorSampleCounts is a bitmask1 of VkSampleCountFlagBits indicating the sample counts supported for all 2D images created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, usage containing VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, and a non-integer color format.
trans-unit.target: sampledImageColorSampleCounts 是位掩码1的VkSampleCountFlagBits指示支持用于创建的所有二维图像的样本计数 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL ， usage 含有 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT ，和一个非整数颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: sampledImageDepthSampleCounts is a bitmask1 of VkSampleCountFlagBits indicating the sample counts supported for all 2D images created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, usage containing VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, and a depth format.
trans-unit.target: sampledImageDepthSampleCounts 是位掩码1的VkSampleCountFlagBits指示支持用于创建的所有二维图像的样本计数 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL ， usage 含有 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT 和深度格式。

trans-unit.source: sampledImageIntegerSampleCounts is a bitmask1 of VkSampleCountFlagBits indicating the sample counts supported for all 2D images created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, usage containing VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, and an integer color format.
trans-unit.target: sampledImageIntegerSampleCounts 是位掩码1的VkSampleCountFlagBits指示支持用于创建的所有二维图像的样本计数 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL ， usage 含有 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT 和整数颜色格式。

trans-unit.source: sampledImageStencilSampleCounts is a bitmask1 of VkSampleCountFlagBits indicating the sample supported for all 2D images created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, usage containing VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT, and a stencil format.
trans-unit.target: sampledImageStencilSampleCounts 是位掩码1的VkSampleCountFlagBits指示支持用于创建的所有二维图像的样品 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL ， usage 含有 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT ，和一个模版格式。

trans-unit.source: sampler is a sampler handle, and is used in descriptor updates for types VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER and VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER if the binding being updated does not use immutable samplers.
trans-unit.target: sampler 是采样器句柄，如果要更新的绑定未使用不可变采样器，则在描述符更新中用于 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER 和 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER 类型。

trans-unit.source: sampler is the sampler to destroy.
trans-unit.target: sampler 是要销毁的采样器。

trans-unit.source: samplerAnisotropy indicates whether anisotropic filtering is supported. If this feature is not enabled, the maxAnisotropy member of the VkSamplerCreateInfo structure must be 1.0.
trans-unit.target: samplerAnisotropy 指示是否支持各向异性过滤。如果未启用此功能，则 VkSamplerCreateInfo 结构的 maxAnisotropy 成员必须为1.0。

trans-unit.source: samples > 1
trans-unit.target: samples > 1

trans-unit.source: samples = 1
trans-unit.target: samples = 1

trans-unit.source: samples = ci.samples
trans-unit.target: samples = ci。 samples

trans-unit.source: samples is VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: samples 为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT

trans-unit.source: samples is the number of samples of the image as defined in VkSampleCountFlagBits.
trans-unit.target: samples 是VkSampleCountFlagBits中定义的图像样本数。

trans-unit.source: samples is the number of samples per pixel as defined in VkSampleCountFlagBits.
trans-unit.target: samples 是VkSampleCountFlagBits中定义的每个像素的样本数。

trans-unit.source: samples is the number of sub-data element samples in the image as defined in VkSampleCountFlagBits. See Multisampling.
trans-unit.target: samples 是图像中子数据元素样本的数量，如VkSampleCountFlagBits中所定义。请参阅多重采样。

trans-unit.source: samplesmust be a bit value that is set in VkImageFormatProperties::sampleCounts returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, imageType, tiling, usage, and flags equal to those in this structure
trans-unit.target: samples 必须是由 vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties 返回的 VkImageFormatProperties :: sampleCounts 中设置的位值，其 format ， imageType ， tiling ， usage 和 flags 与该结构中的相等

trans-unit.source: samplesmust be a bit value that is set in VkImageFormatProperties::sampleCounts returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties with format, type, tiling, and usage equal to those in this command and flags equal to the value that is set in VkImageCreateInfo::flags when the image is created
trans-unit.target: samples 必须是被设置在一个位值 VkImageFormatProperties :: sampleCounts 通过返回 vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties 与 format ， type ， tiling ，并 usage 等于在该命令和 flags 等于在设定的值 VkImageCreateInfo :: flags 时的图像是被创造

trans-unit.source: samplesmust be a valid VkSampleCountFlagBits value
trans-unit.target: samples 必须是有效的VkSampleCountFlagBits值

trans-unit.source: scissorCount and viewportCountmust be identical
trans-unit.target: scissorCount 和 viewportCount 必须相同

trans-unit.source: scissorCount is the number of scissors and must match the number of viewports.
trans-unit.target: scissorCount 是多少剪刀和必须视口的数量相匹配。

trans-unit.source: scissorCount is the number of scissors whose rectangles are updated by the command.
trans-unit.target: scissorCount 是通过命令更新其矩形的剪刀的数量。

trans-unit.source: scissorCountmust be between 1 and VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxViewports, inclusive
trans-unit.target: scissorCount 必须在 1 到 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxViewports 之间（含）

trans-unit.source: scissorCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: scissorCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: semaphore is the handle of the semaphore to destroy.
trans-unit.target: semaphore 是要销毁的信号量的句柄。

trans-unit.source: setLayoutCount is the number of descriptor sets included in the pipeline layout.
trans-unit.target: setLayoutCount 是管道布局中包含的描述符集的数量。

trans-unit.source: setLayoutCountmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxBoundDescriptorSets
trans-unit.target: setLayoutCount 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxBoundDescriptorSets

trans-unit.source: shaderClipDistance indicates whether clip distances are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, any members decorated with the ClipDistance built-in decoration must not be read from or written to in shader modules. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the ClipDistance capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderClipDistance 指示着色器代码中是否支持剪辑距离。如果未启用此功能，任何成员饰有 ClipDistance 内置的装修一定不能读取或着色器模块写入。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 ClipDistance 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderCullDistance indicates whether cull distances are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, any members decorated with the CullDistance built-in decoration must not be read from or written to in shader modules. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the CullDistance capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderCullDistance 指示着色器代码中是否支持剔除距离。如果未启用此功能，饰有任何成员 CullDistance 内置的装修一定不能读取或着色器模块写入。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 CullDistance 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderFloat64 indicates whether 64-bit floats (doubles) are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, 64-bit floating-point types must not be used in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the Float64 capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderFloat64 指示着色器代码中是否支持64位浮点（双精度）。如果未启用此功能，64位浮点类型必须不能在着色器代码中使用。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 Float64 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderImageGatherExtended indicates whether the extended set of image gather instructions are available in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, the OpImage*Gather instructions do not support the Offset and ConstOffsets operands. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the ImageGatherExtended capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderImageGatherExtended 指示着色器代码中是否提供扩展的图像收集指令集。如果未启用此功能，则 OpImage * Gather 指令不支持 Offset 和 ConstOffsets 操作数。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 ImageGatherExtended 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderInt16 indicates whether 16-bit integers (signed and unsigned) are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, 16-bit integer types must not be used in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the Int16 capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderInt16 指示着色器代码中是否支持16位整数（有符号和无符号）。如果未启用此功能，16位整数类型必须不能在着色器代码中使用。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 Int16 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderInt64 indicates whether 64-bit integers (signed and unsigned) are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, 64-bit integer types must not be used in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the Int64 capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderInt64 指示着色器代码中是否支持64位整数（有符号和无符号）。如果未启用此功能，64位整数类型必须不能在着色器代码中使用。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 Int64 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderModule is the handle of the shader module to destroy.
trans-unit.target: shaderModule 是要销毁的shader模块的句柄。

trans-unit.source: shaderResourceMinLod indicates whether image operations that specify the minimum resource level-of-detail (LOD) are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, the MinLod image operand must not be used in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the MinLod capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderResourceMinLod 指示在着色器代码中是否支持指定最小资源详细程度（LOD）的图像操作。如果未启用此功能， MinLod 图像操作数必须不能在着色器代码中使用。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 MinLod 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderResourceResidency indicates whether image operations that return resource residency information are supported in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, the OpImageSparse* instructions must not be used in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the SparseResidency capability. The feature requires at least one of the sparseResidency* features to be supported.
trans-unit.target: shaderResourceResidency 指示着色器代码中是否支持返回资源驻留信息的映像操作。如果未启用此功能， OpImageSparse *指令必须不能在着色器代码中使用。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 SparseResidency 功能。该功能至少需要支持 sparseResidency *功能之一。

trans-unit.source: shaderSampledImageArrayDynamicIndexing indicates whether arrays of samplers or sampled images can be indexed by dynamically uniform integer expressions in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, resources with a descriptor type of VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER, VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER, or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGEmust be indexed only by constant integral expressions when aggregated into arrays in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the SampledImageArrayDynamicIndexing capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderSampledImageArrayDynamicIndexing 指示是否可以通过着色器代码中的动态统一整数表达式来索引采样器或采样图像的数组。如果未启用此功能，则在着色器代码 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER 描述符类型为VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLER， VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_COMBINED_IMAGE_SAMPLER 或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_SAMPLED_IMAGE 的资源进行索引时，仅必须使用常量整数表达式对其进行索引。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 SampledImageArrayDynamicIndexing 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageBufferArrayDynamicIndexing indicates whether arrays of storage buffers can be indexed by dynamically uniform integer expressions in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, resources with a descriptor type of VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMICmust be indexed only by constant integral expressions when aggregated into arrays in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageBufferArrayDynamicIndexing capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageBufferArrayDynamicIndexing 指示是否可以通过着色器代码中的动态统一整数表达式索引存储缓冲区的数组。如果未启用此功能，则在以着色器代码聚合到数组中时，必须仅通过常量整数表达式来索引描述符类型为 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER 或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_BUFFER_DYNAMIC 的资源。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageBufferArrayDynamicIndexing 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageImageArrayDynamicIndexing indicates whether arrays of storage images can be indexed by dynamically uniform integer expressions in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, resources with a descriptor type of VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGEmust be indexed only by constant integral expressions when aggregated into arrays in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageImageArrayDynamicIndexing capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageImageArrayDynamicIndexing 指示是否可以通过着色器代码中的动态统一整数表达式对存储映像的数组进行索引。如果未启用此功能，则在以着色器代码聚合到数组中时，必须仅通过常量整数表达式来索引描述符类型为 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_STORAGE_IMAGE 的资源。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageImageArrayDynamicIndexing 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageImageExtendedFormats indicates whether the extended storage image formats are available in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, the formats requiring the StorageImageExtendedFormats capability are not supported for storage images. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageImageExtendedFormats capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageImageExtendedFormats 指示着色器代码中是否提供扩展的存储映像格式。如果未启用此功能，则存储映像不支持需要 StorageImageExtendedFormats 功能的格式。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageImageExtendedFormats 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageImageMultisample indicates whether multisampled storage images are supported. If this feature is not enabled, images that are created with a usage that includes VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BITmust be created with samples equal to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageImageMultisample capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageImageMultisample 指示是否支持多重采样的存储映像。如果未启用此功能，则必须使用等于 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 的 samples 来创建 usage 包含 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT 的图像。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageImageMultisample 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageImageReadWithoutFormat indicates whether storage images require a format qualifier to be specified when reading from storage images. If this feature is not enabled, the OpImageRead instruction must not have an OpTypeImage of Unknown. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageImageReadWithoutFormat capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageImageReadWithoutFormat 指示从存储映像读取时是否需要指定存储格式来指定格式限定符。如果未启用此功能， OpImageRead 指令必须不具有 OpTypeImage 的 Unknown 。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageImageReadWithoutFormat 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderStorageImageWriteWithoutFormat indicates whether storage images require a format qualifier to be specified when writing to storage images. If this feature is not enabled, the OpImageWrite instruction must not have an OpTypeImage of Unknown. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the StorageImageWriteWithoutFormat capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderStorageImageWriteWithoutFormat 指示在写入存储映像时是否需要指定存储格式来指定格式限定符。如果未启用此功能， OpImageWrite 指令必须不具有 OpTypeImage 的 Unknown 。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 StorageImageWriteWithoutFormat 功能。

trans-unit.source: shaderTessellationAndGeometryPointSize indicates whether the PointSize built-in decoration is available in the tessellation control, tessellation evaluation, and geometry shader stages. If this feature is not enabled, members decorated with the PointSize built-in decoration must not be read from or written to and all points written from a tessellation or geometry shader will have a size of 1.0. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the TessellationPointSize capability for tessellation control and evaluation shaders, or if the shader modules can declare the GeometryPointSize capability for geometry shaders. An implementation supporting this feature must also support one or both of the tessellationShader or geometryShader features.
trans-unit.target: shaderTessellationAndGeometryPointSize 指示在镶嵌细分控件，镶嵌细分评估和几何着色器阶段是否可以使用 PointSize 内置装饰。如果未启用此功能，会员装饰着 PointSize 内置装修必须不能读取或写入和镶嵌或几何着色器写入的所有点都会有一个大小为1.0。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明镶嵌细分控制和评估着色器的 TessellationPointSize 功能，或者着色器模块是否可以声明 GeometryPointSize 几何着色器的功能。支持此功能的实现还必须支持 tessellationShader 或 geometryShader 功能中的一个或两个。

trans-unit.source: shaderUniformBufferArrayDynamicIndexing indicates whether arrays of uniform buffers can be indexed by dynamically uniform integer expressions in shader code. If this feature is not enabled, resources with a descriptor type of VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER or VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMICmust be indexed only by constant integral expressions when aggregated into arrays in shader code. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the UniformBufferArrayDynamicIndexing capability.
trans-unit.target: shaderUniformBufferArrayDynamicIndexing 指示是否可以通过着色器代码中的动态统一整数表达式索引统一缓冲区的数组。如果未启用此功能，与描述符类型的资源 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER 或 VK_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE_UNIFORM_BUFFER_DYNAMIC 必须只能由整型常量表达式时，聚集到shader代码数组索引。这还指示着色器模块是否可以声明 UniformBufferArrayDynamicIndexing 功能。

trans-unit.source: sharingMode is a VkSharingMode value specifying the sharing mode of the buffer when it will be accessed by multiple queue families.
trans-unit.target: sharingMode 是一个VkSharingMode值，用于指定多个队列系列将访问该缓冲区时缓冲区的共享模式。

trans-unit.source: sharingMode is a VkSharingMode value specifying the sharing mode of the image when it will be accessed by multiple queue families.
trans-unit.target: sharingMode 是一个VkSharingMode值，用于指定多个队列系列将访问该图像时的图像共享模式。

trans-unit.source: sharingModemust be a valid VkSharingMode value
trans-unit.target: sharingMode 必须为有效的VkSharingMode值

trans-unit.source: signalSemaphoreCount is the number of semaphores to be signaled once the commands specified in pCommandBuffers have completed execution.
trans-unit.target: signalSemaphoreCount 是在 pCommandBuffers 中指定的命令完成执行后要发出信号的信号量。

trans-unit.source: signalSemaphoreCount is the number of semaphores to be signaled once the sparse binding operations specified by the structure have completed execution.
trans-unit.target: signalSemaphoreCount 是一旦结构指定的稀疏绑定操作完成执行后要发出信号的信号量。

trans-unit.source: size is a size in bytes of the affected area of backing memory for buffer, or VK_WHOLE_SIZE to use the range from offset to the end of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: size 是 buffer 的后备内存受影响区域的大小（以字节为单位），或 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 以使用从 offset 到缓冲区末尾的范围。

trans-unit.source: size is either the size of range, or VK_WHOLE_SIZE to affect the range from offset to the end of the current mapping of the allocation.
trans-unit.target: size 是范围的大小，或者是 VK_WHOLE_SIZE ,以影响从 offset 到当前分配映射结束的范围。

trans-unit.source: size is the byte size of the specialization constant value within the supplied data buffer.
trans-unit.target: size 是提供的数据缓冲区内专业化常量值的字节大小。

trans-unit.source: size is the number of bytes to copy.
trans-unit.target: size 是要复制的字节数。

trans-unit.source: size is the number of bytes to fill, and must be either a multiple of 4, or VK_WHOLE_SIZE to fill the range from offset to the end of the buffer. If VK_WHOLE_SIZE is used and the remaining size of the buffer is not a multiple of 4, then the nearest smaller multiple is used.
trans-unit.target: size 是要填充的字节数，并且必须是4的倍数，或者必须是 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 才能填充从 offset 到缓冲区末尾的范围。如果使用 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 并且缓冲区的剩余大小不是4的倍数，则使用最接近的较小倍数。

trans-unit.source: size is the requested size of an allocation.
trans-unit.target: size 是请求的分配大小。

trans-unit.source: size is the size in bytes of the buffer to be created.
trans-unit.target: size 是要创建的缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: size is the size in bytes of the image subresource. size includes any extra memory that is required based on rowPitch.
trans-unit.target: size 是图像子资源的大小（以字节为单位）。 size 包括基于 rowPitch 所需的任何额外内存。

trans-unit.source: size is the size in bytes of the requested allocation.
trans-unit.target: size 是请求分配的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: size is the size of the memory range to map, or VK_WHOLE_SIZE to map from offset to the end of the allocation.
trans-unit.target: size 是要映射的内存范围的大小，或者是从 offset 到分配末尾要映射的 VK_WHOLE_SIZE 的大小。

trans-unit.source: size is the size of the memory region to be bound.
trans-unit.target: size 是要绑定的内存区域的大小。

trans-unit.source: size is the size of the push constant range to update, in units of bytes.
trans-unit.target: size 是要更新的推送常量范围的大小，以字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: size is the size, in bytes, of the memory allocation required for the resource.
trans-unit.target: size 是资源所需的内存分配的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: size is the total memory size in bytes in the heap.
trans-unit.target: size 是堆中的总内存大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: sizemust be a multiple of 4
trans-unit.target: size 必须是 4 的倍数

trans-unit.source: sizemust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: size 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: sizemust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxPushConstantsSize minus offset
trans-unit.target: size 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxPushConstantsSize 减去 offset

trans-unit.source: sizemust be less than or equal to the size of memory minus memoryOffset
trans-unit.target: size 必须小于或等于 memory 大小减去 memoryOffset

trans-unit.source: sizemust be less than or equal to the size of the resource minus resourceOffset
trans-unit.target: size 必须小于或等于资源的大小减去 resourceOffset

trans-unit.source: sparseAddressSpaceSize is the total amount of address space available, in bytes, for sparse memory resources. This is an upper bound on the sum of the size of all sparse resources, regardless of whether any memory is bound to them.
trans-unit.target: sparseAddressSpaceSize 是可用的地址空间总量，以字节为单位，用于稀疏内存资源。这是所有稀疏资源大小总和的上限，无论是否有任何内存绑定到它们。

trans-unit.source: sparseBinding indicates whether resource memory can be managed at opaque sparse block level instead of at the object level. If this feature is not enabled, resource memory must be bound only on a per-object basis using the vkBindBufferMemory and vkBindImageMemory commands. In this case, buffers and images must not be created with VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT and VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT set in the flags member of the VkBufferCreateInfo and VkImageCreateInfo structures, respectively. Otherwise resource memory can be managed as described in Sparse Resource Features.
trans-unit.target: sparseBinding 指示是否可以在不透明的稀疏块级别而不是对象级别上管理资源内存。如果未启用此功能，资源存储必须只使用每个对象的基础上结合 vkBindBufferMemory 和 vkBindImageMemory 命令。在这种情况下，缓冲器和图像必须不能与创建 VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 和 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_BINDING_BIT 在该组 flags 的的构件 VkBufferCreateInfo 和 VkImageCreateInfo 结构分别。否则资源内存可以按稀疏资源功能中所述进行管理。

trans-unit.source: sparseProperties is the VkPhysicalDeviceSparseProperties structure which specifies various sparse related properties of the physical device. See Sparse Properties for details.
trans-unit.target: sparseProperties 是VkPhysicalDeviceSparseProperties结构，它指定物理设备的各种稀疏相关属性。有关详细信息，请参见稀疏属性。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidency16Samples indicates whether the physical device can access partially resident 2D images with 16 samples per pixel. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and samples set to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_16_BITmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidency16Samples 指示物理设备是否可以访问每像素16个样本的部分驻留2D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 和 samples 设置为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_16_BIT 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidency2Samples indicates whether the physical device can access partially resident 2D images with 2 samples per pixel. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and samples set to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_2_BITmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidency2Samples 指示物理设备是否可以访问每个像素具有2个样本的部分驻留2D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 和 samples 设置为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_2_BIT 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidency4Samples indicates whether the physical device can access partially resident 2D images with 4 samples per pixel. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and samples set to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_4_BITmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidency4Samples 指示物理设备是否可以访问每个像素具有4个样本的部分驻留2D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 和 samples 设置为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_4_BIT 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidency8Samples indicates whether the physical device can access partially resident 2D images with 8 samples per pixel. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and samples set to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_8_BITmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidency8Samples 指示物理设备是否可以访问每像素8个样本的部分驻留2D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 和 samples 设置为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_8_BIT 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidencyAliased indicates whether the physical device can correctly access data aliased into multiple locations. If this feature is not enabled, the VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT and VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT enum values must not be used in flags members of the VkBufferCreateInfo and VkImageCreateInfo structures, respectively.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidencyAliased 指示物理设备是否可以正确访问别名为多个位置的数据。如果未启用此功能， VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT 和 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_ALIASED_BIT 枚举值必须不能在使用 flags 的成员 VkBufferCreateInfo 和 VkImageCreateInfo 结构分别。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidencyBuffer indicates whether the device can access partially resident buffers. If this feature is not enabled, buffers must not be created with VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkBufferCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidencyBuffer 指示设备是否可以访问部分驻留的缓冲区。如果未启用此功能，缓冲区必须不能与创建 VK_BUFFER_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkBufferCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidencyImage2D indicates whether the device can access partially resident 2D images with 1 sample per pixel. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D and samples set to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BITmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidencyImage2D 指示设备是否可以访问每像素1个样本的部分驻留2D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_2D 和 samples 设置为 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: sparseResidencyImage3D indicates whether the device can access partially resident 3D images. If this feature is not enabled, images with an imageType of VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3Dmust not be created with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT set in the flags member of the VkImageCreateInfo structure.
trans-unit.target: sparseResidencyImage3D 指示设备是否可以访问部分驻留的3D图像。如果未启用此功能，具有图像 imageType 的 VK_IMAGE_TYPE_3D 必须不能与创建 VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPARSE_RESIDENCY_BIT 在设置 flags 的成员 VkImageCreateInfo 结构。

trans-unit.source: specVersion is the Vulkan version the layer was written to, encoded as described in the API Version Numbers and Semantics section.
trans-unit.target: specVersion 是该层写入的Vulkan版本，其编码如API版本号和语义部分中所述。

trans-unit.source: specVersion is the version of this extension. It is an integer, incremented with backward compatible changes.
trans-unit.target: specVersion 是此扩展的版本。它是一个整数，随着向后兼容的更改而增加。

trans-unit.source: srcAccessMask is a bitmask of VkAccessFlagBits specifying a source access mask.
trans-unit.target: srcAccessMask 是一个位掩码VkAccessFlagBits指定源的访问掩码。

trans-unit.source: srcAccessMaskmust be a valid combination of VkAccessFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: srcAccessMask 必须是VkAccessFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: srcAlphaBlendFactor selects which blend factor is used to determine the source factor Sa.
trans-unit.target: srcAlphaBlendFactor 选择使用哪个混合因子来确定源因子S a。

trans-unit.source: srcAlphaBlendFactormust be a valid VkBlendFactor value
trans-unit.target: srcAlphaBlendFactor 必须是有效的VkBlendFactor值

trans-unit.source: srcBindingmust be a valid binding within srcSet
trans-unit.target: srcBinding 必须是内有效结合 srcSet

trans-unit.source: srcBuffer is the source buffer.
trans-unit.target: srcBuffer 是源缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: srcBuffermust be a valid VkBuffer handle
trans-unit.target: srcBuffer 必须是有效的 VkBuffer 句柄

trans-unit.source: srcBuffermust have been created with VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT usage flag
trans-unit.target: srcBuffer 必须已使用 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 使用标志创建

trans-unit.source: srcCacheCount is the length of the pSrcCaches array.
trans-unit.target: srcCacheCount 是 pSrcCaches 数组的长度。

trans-unit.source: srcCacheCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: srcCacheCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: srcColorBlendFactor selects which blend factor is used to determine the source factors (Sr,Sg,Sb).
trans-unit.target: srcColorBlendFactor 选择哪个混合因子用于确定源因子（S r，S g，S b）。

trans-unit.source: srcColorBlendFactormust be a valid VkBlendFactor value
trans-unit.target: srcColorBlendFactor 必须是有效的VkBlendFactor值

trans-unit.source: srcImage and dstImagemust have been created with the same image format
trans-unit.target: srcImage 和 dstImage 必须以相同的图像格式创建

trans-unit.source: srcImage is the source image.
trans-unit.target: srcImage 是源图像。

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust be a valid VkImage handle
trans-unit.target: srcImage 必须是有效的 VkImage 句柄

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust have a sample count equal to VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: srcImage 的样本数必须等于 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust have a sample count equal to any valid sample count value other than VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: srcImage 的采样数必须等于 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 以外的任何有效采样数值

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust have been created with VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT usage flag
trans-unit.target: srcImage 必须已使用 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 使用标志创建

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust have been created with a samples value of VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: srcImage 必须已使用 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT 的 samples 值创建

trans-unit.source: srcImagemust use a format that supports VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT, which is indicated by VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (for linearly tiled images) or VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures (for optimally tiled images) - as returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties
trans-unit.target: srcImage 必须使用支持 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 的格式，该格式由 VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures （用于线性平铺图像）或 VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures （用于最佳平铺图像） vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties -由vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties返回

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayout is the current layout of the source image subresource.
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 是源图像子资源的当前布局。

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayout is the layout of the source image subresources for the blit.
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 是blit的源图像子资源的布局。

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayout is the layout of the source image subresources for the copy.
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 是副本的源图像子资源的布局。

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayout is the layout of the source image subresources for the resolve.
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 是用于解析的源图像子资源的布局。

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayoutmust be VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_SRC_OPTIMAL or VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_GENERAL
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 必须为 VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_TRANSFER_SRC_OPTIMAL 或 VK_IMAGE_LAYOUT_GENERAL

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayoutmust be a valid VkImageLayout value
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 必须是有效的VkImageLayout值

trans-unit.source: srcImageLayoutmust specify the layout of the image subresources of srcImage specified in pRegions at the time this command is executed on a VkDevice
trans-unit.target: srcImageLayout 必须指定的图像的子资源的布局 srcImage 中指定 pRegions 当时此命令上的执行 VkDevice

trans-unit.source: srcOffset.x and (extent.width + srcOffset.x) must both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource width
trans-unit.target: srcOffset.x 和（ extent.width + srcOffset.x ）必须都大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源的宽度

trans-unit.source: srcOffset.y and (extent.height + srcOffset.y) must both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource height
trans-unit.target: srcOffset.y 和（ extent.height + srcOffset.y ）必须既大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源高度

trans-unit.source: srcOffset.z and (extent.depth + srcOffset.z) must both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource depth
trans-unit.target: srcOffset.z 和（ extent.depth + srcOffset.z ）必须都大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源深度

trans-unit.source: srcOffset and dstOffset select the initial x, y, and z offsets in texels of the sub-regions of the source and destination image data.
trans-unit.target: srcOffset 和 dstOffset 选择源图像数据和目标图像数据的子区域的纹素中的初始x，y和z偏移。

trans-unit.source: srcOffset and dstOffset select the initial x, y, and z offsets in texels of the sub-regions of the source and destination image data. extent is the size in texels of the source image to resolve in width, height and depth.
trans-unit.target: srcOffset 和 dstOffset 选择源图像数据和目标图像数据的子区域的纹素中的初始x，y和z偏移。 extent 是源图像要解析的 width ， height 和 depth 像素尺寸。

trans-unit.source: srcOffset is the starting offset in bytes from the start of srcBuffer.
trans-unit.target: srcOffset 是从 srcBuffer 的起始位置开始的偏移量（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: srcOffset, dstOffset, and extentmust respect the image transfer granularity requirements of the queue family that it will be submitted against, as described in Physical Device Enumeration
trans-unit.target: srcOffset ， dstOffset 和 extent 必须遵守将要针对其提交的队列系列的图像传输粒度要求，如《物理设备枚举》中所述

trans-unit.source: srcOffset[0].x and srcOffset[1].xmust both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource width
trans-unit.target: srcOffset [0]。 x 和 srcOffset [1]。 x 必须都大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源宽度

trans-unit.source: srcOffset[0].y and srcOffset[1].ymust both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource height
trans-unit.target: srcOffset [0]。 y 和 srcOffset [1]。 y 必须都大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源高度

trans-unit.source: srcOffset[0].z and srcOffset[1].zmust both be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to the source image subresource depth
trans-unit.target: srcOffset [0]。 z 和 srcOffset [1]。 z 必须都大于或等于 0 且小于或等于源图像子资源深度

trans-unit.source: srcOffsets is an array of two VkOffset3D structures specifying the bounds of the source region within srcSubresource.
trans-unit.target: srcOffsets 是两个VkOffset3D结构的数组，指定了 srcSubresource 中源区域的边界。

trans-unit.source: srcQueueFamilyIndex is the source queue family for a queue family ownership transfer.
trans-unit.target: srcQueueFamilyIndex 是队列族所有权转移的源队列族。

trans-unit.source: srcSet, srcBinding, and srcArrayElement are the source set, binding, and array element, respectively.
trans-unit.target: srcSet ， srcBinding 和 srcArrayElement 分别是源集，绑定和数组元素。

trans-unit.source: srcSetmust be a valid VkDescriptorSet handle
trans-unit.target: srcSet 必须是有效的 VkDescriptorSet 句柄

trans-unit.source: srcStageMask is a bitmask of VkPipelineStageFlagBits specifying the source stage mask.
trans-unit.target: srcStageMask 是VkPipelineStageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定源阶段掩码。

trans-unit.source: srcStageMask is a bitmask of VkPipelineStageFlagBits specifying the source stage mask.
trans-unit.target: srcStageMask 是VkPipelineStageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定源阶段掩码。

trans-unit.source: srcStageMaskmust be a valid combination of VkPipelineStageFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: srcStageMask 必须是VkPipelineStageFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: srcStageMaskmust be the bitwise OR of the stageMask parameter used in previous calls to vkCmdSetEvent with any of the members of pEvents and VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT if any of the members of pEvents was set using vkSetEvent
trans-unit.target: srcStageMask 如果使用 vkSetEvent 设置了 pEvents 的任何成员，则srcStageMask 必须是先前对 vkCmdSetEvent 的调用与 pEvents 和 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT 的任何成员中使用的 stageMask 参数的按位或。

trans-unit.source: srcStageMaskmust not be 0
trans-unit.target: srcStageMask 一定不会 0

trans-unit.source: srcSubpass and dstSubpassmust not both be equal to VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL
trans-unit.target: srcSubpass 和 dstSubpass 一定不能同时等于 VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL

trans-unit.source: srcSubpass is the subpass index of the first subpass in the dependency, or VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL.
trans-unit.target: srcSubpass 是依赖项中第一个子通道的子通道索引，即 VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL 。

trans-unit.source: srcSubpassmust be less than or equal to dstSubpass, unless one of them is VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL, to avoid cyclic dependencies and ensure a valid execution order
trans-unit.target: srcSubpass 必须小于或等于 dstSubpass ，除非其中之一是 VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL ，否则将避免循环依赖性并确保有效的执行顺序

trans-unit.source: srcSubresource.baseArrayLayermust be less than and (srcSubresource.layerCount + srcSubresource.baseArrayLayer) must be less than or equal to the number of layers in the source image
trans-unit.target: srcSubresource.baseArrayLayer 必须小于和（ srcSubresource.layerCount + srcSubresource.baseArrayLayer ）必须小于或等于源图像中的层数

trans-unit.source: srcSubresource and dstSubresource are VkImageSubresourceLayers structures specifying the image subresources of the images used for the source and destination image data, respectively.
trans-unit.target: srcSubresource 和 dstSubresource 是VkImageSubresourceLayers结构，分别指定用于源图像数据和目标图像数据的图像的图像子资源。

trans-unit.source: srcSubresource and dstSubresource are VkImageSubresourceLayers structures specifying the image subresources of the images used for the source and destination image data, respectively. Resolve of depth/stencil images is not supported.
trans-unit.target: srcSubresource 和 dstSubresource 是VkImageSubresourceLayers结构，分别指定用于源图像数据和目标图像数据的图像的图像子资源。不支持解析深度/模板图像。

trans-unit.source: srcSubresource is the subresource to blit from.
trans-unit.target: srcSubresource 是要从中复制的子资源。

trans-unit.source: srcSubresourcemust be a valid VkImageSubresourceLayers structure
trans-unit.target: srcSubresource 必须是有效的 VkImageSubresourceLayers 结构

trans-unit.source: stage is a VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo describing the compute shader.
trans-unit.target: stage 是描述计算着色器的VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo。

trans-unit.source: stage is a VkShaderStageFlagBits value specifying a single pipeline stage.
trans-unit.target: stage 是指定单个管道阶段的VkShaderStageFlagBits值。

trans-unit.source: stage points to a structure of type VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo.
trans-unit.target: stage 指向类型为 VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo 的结构。

trans-unit.source: stagemust be a valid VkShaderStageFlagBits value
trans-unit.target: stage 必须是有效的VkShaderStageFlagBits值

trans-unit.source: stagemust be a valid VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo structure
trans-unit.target: stage 必须是有效的 VkPipelineShaderStageCreateInfo 结构

trans-unit.source: stagemust not be VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS, or VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL
trans-unit.target: stage 一定不能 VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL_GRAPHICS ，或 VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL

trans-unit.source: stageCount is the number of entries in the pStages array.
trans-unit.target: stageCount 是 pStages 数组中的条目数。

trans-unit.source: stageCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: stageCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: stageFlags is a bitmask of VkShaderStageFlagBits specifying the shader stages that will use the push constants in the updated range.
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 是一个位掩码VkShaderStageFlagBits指定将使用推常数在更新的范围内的着色器阶段。

trans-unit.source: stageFlags is a set of stage flags describing the shader stages that will access a range of push constants. If a particular stage is not included in the range, then accessing members of that range of push constants from the corresponding shader stage will result in undefined data being read.
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 是一组阶段标志，描述了将访问一系列推送常数的着色器阶段。如果该范围中未包含特定阶段，则从相应的着色器阶段访问该推入常数范围的成员将导致读取未定义的数据。

trans-unit.source: stageFlags member is a bitmask of VkShaderStageFlagBits specifying which pipeline shader stages can access a resource for this binding. VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL is a shorthand specifying that all defined shader stages, including any additional stages defined by extensions, can access the resource.
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 成员是VkShaderStageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定哪些管道着色器阶段可以访问此绑定的资源。 VK_SHADER_STAGE_ALL 是一种简写形式，用于指定所有定义的着色器阶段，包括扩展定义的任何其他阶段，都可以访问资源。

trans-unit.source: stageFlagsmust be a valid combination of VkShaderStageFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 必须是VkShaderStageFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: stageFlagsmust match exactly the shader stages used in layout for the range specified by offset and size
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 必须与用于 offset 和 size 指定范围的 layout 的着色器阶段完全匹配

trans-unit.source: stageFlagsmust not be 0
trans-unit.target: stageFlags 一定不会 0

trans-unit.source: stageMask is a bitmask of VkPipelineStageFlagBits specifying the source stage mask used to determine when the event is unsignaled.
trans-unit.target: stageMask 是VkPipelineStageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定用于确定 event 何时未发出信号的源阶段掩码。

trans-unit.source: stageMask specifies the source stage mask used to determine when the event is signaled.
trans-unit.target: stageMask 指定用于确定何时通知 event 的源阶段掩码。

trans-unit.source: stageMaskmust be a valid combination of VkPipelineStageFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: stageMask 必须是VkPipelineStageFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: stageMaskmust not be 0
trans-unit.target: stageMask 一定不会 0

trans-unit.source: stageMaskmust not include VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT
trans-unit.target: stageMask 必须不包括 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT

trans-unit.source: standardSampleLocations indicates whether rasterization uses the standard sample locations as documented in Multisampling. If set to VK_TRUE, the implementation uses the documented sample locations. If set to VK_FALSE, the implementation may use different sample locations.
trans-unit.target: standardSampleLocations 指示栅格化是否使用Multisampling中记录的标准样本位置。如果设置为 VK_TRUE ，则实现将使用记录的示例位置。如果设置为 VK_FALSE ，则实现可能使用不同的示例位置。

trans-unit.source: stencil is the clear value for the stencil aspect of the depth/stencil attachment. It is a 32-bit integer value which is converted to the attachment’s format by taking the appropriate number of LSBs.
trans-unit.target: stencil 是深度/模板附着的模板方面的明确值。它是一个32位整数值，可通过采用适当数量的LSB转换为附件的格式。

trans-unit.source: stencilLoadOp is a VkAttachmentLoadOp value specifying how the contents of stencil components of the attachment are treated at the beginning of the subpass where it is first used.
trans-unit.target: stencilLoadOp 是一个VkAttachmentLoadOp值，它指定在第一次使用附件的子通道开始处如何处理附件的模板组件的内容。

trans-unit.source: stencilLoadOpmust be a valid VkAttachmentLoadOp value
trans-unit.target: stencilLoadOp 必须是有效的VkAttachmentLoadOp值

trans-unit.source: stencilStoreOp is a VkAttachmentStoreOp value specifying how the contents of stencil components of the attachment are treated at the end of the last subpass where it is used.
trans-unit.target: stencilStoreOp 是一个VkAttachmentStoreOp值，它指定在使用附件的最后一个子通道的末尾如何处理附件的模板组件的内容。

trans-unit.source: stencilStoreOpmust be a valid VkAttachmentStoreOp value
trans-unit.target: stencilStoreOp 必须是有效的VkAttachmentStoreOp值

trans-unit.source: stencilTestEnable controls whether stencil testing is enabled.
trans-unit.target: stencilTestEnable 控制是否启用模板测试。

trans-unit.source: storageImageSampleCounts is a bitmask1 of VkSampleCountFlagBits indicating the sample counts supported for all 2D images created with VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL, and usage containing VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT.
trans-unit.target: storageImageSampleCounts 是位掩码1的VkSampleCountFlagBits指示支持用于创建的所有二维图像的样本计数 VK_IMAGE_TILING_OPTIMAL ，和 usage 含有 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_STORAGE_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: storeOp is a VkAttachmentStoreOp value specifying how the contents of color and depth components of the attachment are treated at the end of the subpass where it is last used.
trans-unit.target: storeOp 是一个VkAttachmentStoreOp值，它指定在上次使用附件的子通道末尾如何处理附件的颜色和深度成分的内容。

trans-unit.source: storeOpmust be a valid VkAttachmentStoreOp value
trans-unit.target: storeOp 必须是有效的VkAttachmentStoreOp值

trans-unit.source: strictLines indicates whether lines are rasterized according to the preferred method of rasterization. If set to VK_FALSE, lines may be rasterized under a relaxed set of rules. If set to VK_TRUE, lines are rasterized as per the strict definition. See Basic Line Segment Rasterization.
trans-unit.target: strictLines 指示是否根据首选的栅格化方法对线进行栅格化。如果设置为 VK_FALSE ，则可以在一组宽松的规则下对线进行栅格化。如果设置为 VK_TRUE ，则按照严格的定义对线进行栅格化。请参见基本线段栅格化。

trans-unit.source: stride is the byte stride between successive sets of draw parameters.
trans-unit.target: stride 是连续绘制参数集之间的字节跨度。

trans-unit.source: stride is the distance in bytes between two consecutive elements within the buffer.
trans-unit.target: stride 是缓冲区中两个连续元素之间的距离（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: stride is the stride in bytes between results for individual queries within dstBuffer. The required size of the backing memory for dstBuffer is determined as described above for vkGetQueryPoolResults.
trans-unit.target: stride 是 dstBuffer 中各个查询的结果之间的字节间隔。如上文vkGetQueryPoolResults所述，确定 dstBuffer 所需的后备内存大小。

trans-unit.source: stride is the stride in bytes between results for individual queries within pData.
trans-unit.target: stride 是 pData 中各个查询的结果之间的字节间隔。

trans-unit.source: stridemust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxVertexInputBindingStride
trans-unit.target: stride 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxVertexInputBindingStride

trans-unit.source: subPixelInterpolationOffsetBits is the number of subpixel fractional bits that the x and y offsets to the InterpolateAtOffset extended instruction may be rounded to as fixed-point values.
trans-unit.target: subPixelInterpolationOffsetBits 是子像素的分数位的数目，所述 x 和 y 偏移到 InterpolateAtOffset 扩展指令可以被舍入到定点值。

trans-unit.source: subPixelPrecisionBits is the number of bits of subpixel precision in framebuffer coordinates xf and yf. See html/vkspec.html#primsrast.
trans-unit.target: subPixelPrecisionBits 是帧缓冲区坐标x f和y f 中子像素精度的位数。参见html / vkspec.html＃primsrast。

trans-unit.source: subTexelPrecisionBits is the number of bits of precision in the division along an axis of an image used for minification and magnification filters. 2subTexelPrecisionBits is the actual number of divisions along each axis of the image represented. The filtering hardware will snap to these locations when computing the filtered results.
trans-unit.target: subTexelPrecisionBits 是沿用于缩小和放大滤镜的图像轴划分的精度位数。2 subTexelPrecisionBits 是沿所表示图像的每个轴的实际划分数。在计算过滤结果时，过滤硬件将捕捉到这些位置。

trans-unit.source: submitCount is the number of elements in the pSubmits array.
trans-unit.target: submitCount 是在元件的数量 pSubmits 阵列。

trans-unit.source: subpass is the index of the subpass in the render pass where this pipeline will be used.
trans-unit.target: subpass 是渲染通道中将使用此管道的子通道的索引。

trans-unit.source: subpass is the index of the subpass within the render pass instance that the VkCommandBuffer will be executed within. If the VkCommandBuffer will not be executed within a render pass instance, subpass is ignored.
trans-unit.target: subpass 是渲染过程实例，该内subpass的索引 VkCommandBuffer 将内被执行。如果 VkCommandBuffer 不会在渲染过程实例内执行， subpass 被忽略。

trans-unit.source: subpassmust be a valid subpass within renderpass
trans-unit.target: subpass 必须是renderpass中的有效子 renderpass

trans-unit.source: subpassCount is the number of subpasses to create for this render pass. Subpasses are referred to by zero-based indices in the range [0,subpassCount). A render pass must have at least one subpass.
trans-unit.target: subpassCount 是为此渲染过程创建的子过程的数量。子通道由[0， subpassCount ）范围内的从零开始的索引引用。渲染通道必须至少具有一个子通道。

trans-unit.source: subpassCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: subpassCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: subresource is the aspectMask and region of interest in the image.
