trans-unit.target: subresource 是图像中的aspectMask和感兴趣区域。

trans-unit.source: subresourcemust be a valid VkImageSubresource structure
trans-unit.target: subresource 必须是有效的 VkImageSubresource 结构

trans-unit.source: subresourcemust be a valid image subresource for image (see html/vkspec.html#resources-image-views)
trans-unit.target: subresource 必须是一个有效的图像子资源 image （见HTML / vkspec.html＃资源图像的视图）

trans-unit.source: subresourceRange and viewTypemust be compatible with the image, as described in the compatibility table
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange 和 viewType 必须是与图像兼容，如在所描述的相容性表

trans-unit.source: subresourceRange describes the image subresource range within image that is affected by this barrier.
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange 描述了图像子资源范围内 image 由该屏障的影响。

trans-unit.source: subresourceRange is a VkImageSubresourceRange selecting the set of mipmap levels and array layers to be accessible to the view.
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange 是VkImageSubresourceRange选择该组的mipmap水平和阵列层的是到视图访问。

trans-unit.source: subresourceRange::baseArrayLayermust be less than the arrayLayers specified in VkImageCreateInfo when image was created
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange :: baseArrayLayer 必须比少 arrayLayers 规定VkImageCreateInfo当 image 被创建

trans-unit.source: subresourceRange::baseMipLevelmust be less than the mipLevels specified in VkImageCreateInfo when image was created
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange :: baseMipLevel 必须比少 mipLevels 规定VkImageCreateInfo当 image 被创建

trans-unit.source: subresourceRangemust be a valid VkImageSubresourceRange structure
trans-unit.target: subresourceRange 必须是有效的 VkImageSubresourceRange 结构

trans-unit.source: tessellationShader indicates whether tessellation control and evaluation shaders are supported. If this feature is not enabled, the VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT, VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT, VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT, and VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PIPELINE_TESSELLATION_STATE_CREATE_INFO enum values must not be used. This also indicates whether shader modules can declare the Tessellation capability.
trans-unit.target: tessellationShader 指示是否支持镶嵌控制和评估着色器。如果未启用此功能， VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_BIT ， VK_SHADER_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_CONTROL_SHADER_BIT ， VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TESSELLATION_EVALUATION_SHADER_BIT 和 VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PIPELINE_TESSELLATION_STATE_CREATE_INFO 枚举值必须不能使用。这也表明着色器模块是否可以声明 Tessellation 功能。

trans-unit.source: textureCompressionASTC_LDR indicates whether all of the ASTC LDR compressed texture formats are supported. If this feature is enabled, then the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT, VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT and VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT features must be supported in optimalTilingFeatures for the following formats:
trans-unit.target: textureCompressionASTC_LDR 指示是否支持所有ASTC LDR压缩纹理格式。如果启用此功能，则 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT ， VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 和 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT 功能必须要在支持 optimalTilingFeatures 以下格式：

trans-unit.source: textureCompressionBC indicates whether all of the BC compressed texture formats are supported. If this feature is enabled, then the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT, VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT and VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT features must be supported in optimalTilingFeatures for the following formats:
trans-unit.target: textureCompressionBC 指示是否支持所有BC压缩纹理格式。如果启用此功能，则 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT ， VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 和 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT 功能必须要在支持 optimalTilingFeatures 以下格式：

trans-unit.source: textureCompressionETC2 indicates whether all of the ETC2 and EAC compressed texture formats are supported. If this feature is enabled, then the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT, VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT and VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT features must be supported in optimalTilingFeatures for the following formats:
trans-unit.target: textureCompressionETC2 指示是否支持所有ETC2和EAC压缩纹理格式。如果启用此功能，则 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_BIT ， VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_BLIT_SRC_BIT 和 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT 功能必须要在支持 optimalTilingFeatures 以下格式：

trans-unit.source: tiling is a VkImageTiling value specifying the image tiling, corresponding to VkImageCreateInfo::tiling.
trans-unit.target: tiling 是一个VkImageTiling值，它指定图像平铺，对应于VkImageCreateInfo :: tiling 。

trans-unit.source: tiling is a VkImageTiling value specifying the tiling arrangement of the data elements in memory.
trans-unit.target: tiling 是VkImageTiling值，用于指定内存中数据元素的平铺排列。

trans-unit.source: tiling is the tiling arrangement of the data elements in memory.
trans-unit.target: tiling 是内存中数据元素的切片排列。

trans-unit.source: tilingmust be a valid VkImageTiling value
trans-unit.target: tiling 必须是一个有效的VkImageTiling值

trans-unit.source: timeout is the timeout period in units of nanoseconds. timeout is adjusted to the closest value allowed by the implementation-dependent timeout accuracy, which may be substantially longer than one nanosecond, and may be longer than the requested period.
trans-unit.target: timeout 是超时时间，以纳秒为单位。 timeout 被调整为与实现相关的超时精度所允许的最接近的值，该值可能长于一纳秒，并且可能长于所请求的时间段。

trans-unit.source: timestampComputeAndGraphics indicates support for timestamps on all graphics and compute queues. If this limit is set to VK_TRUE, all queues that advertise the VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT or VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT in the VkQueueFamilyProperties::queueFlags support VkQueueFamilyProperties::timestampValidBits of at least 36. See Timestamp Queries.
trans-unit.target: timestampComputeAndGraphics 表示对所有图形和计算队列上的时间戳的支持。如果此限制设置为 VK_TRUE ， VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT 在 VkQueueFamilyProperties :: queueFlags 中播发 VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT 或VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT的所有队列都支持至少为36的 VkQueueFamilyProperties :: timestampValidBits 。请参阅时间戳查询。

trans-unit.source: timestampPeriod is the number of nanoseconds required for a timestamp query to be incremented by 1. See Timestamp Queries.
trans-unit.target: timestampPeriod 是将时间戳查询增加1 所需的纳秒数。请参阅Timestamp Queries。

trans-unit.source: timestampValidBits is the unsigned integer count of meaningful bits in the timestamps written via vkCmdWriteTimestamp. The valid range for the count is 36..64 bits, or a value of 0, indicating no support for timestamps. Bits outside the valid range are guaranteed to be zeros.
trans-unit.target: timestampValidBits 是通过 vkCmdWriteTimestamp 写入的时间戳中有意义位的无符号整数计数。计数的有效范围是36..64位或值为0，表示不支持时间戳。有效范围之外的位保证为零。

trans-unit.source: topology is a VkPrimitiveTopology defining the primitive topology, as described below.
trans-unit.target: topology 是定义原始拓扑的VkPrimitiveTopology，如下所述。

trans-unit.source: topologymust be a valid VkPrimitiveTopology value
trans-unit.target: topology 必须是有效的VkPrimitiveTopology值

trans-unit.source: type is a VkImageType value specifying the image type, corresponding to VkImageCreateInfo::imageType.
trans-unit.target: type 是指定图像类型的VkImageType值，对应于VkImageCreateInfo :: imageType 。

trans-unit.source: type is the dimensionality of image.
trans-unit.target: type 是图像的维数。

trans-unit.source: type is the type of descriptor.
trans-unit.target: type 是描述符的类型。

trans-unit.source: typemust be a valid VkDescriptorType value
trans-unit.target: type 必须是有效的VkDescriptorType值

trans-unit.source: typemust be a valid VkImageType value
trans-unit.target: type 必须是有效的VkImageType值

trans-unit.source: uint32 are the color clear values when the format of the image or attachment is unsigned integer (UINT). Unsigned integer values are converted to the format of the image by casting to the integer type with fewer bits.
trans-unit.target: uint32 是图像或附件的格式为无符号整数（ UINT ）时的颜色清除值。通过将无符号整数值转换为较少位数的整数类型，可以将其转换为图像格式。

trans-unit.source: unnormalizedCoordinates controls whether to use unnormalized or normalized texel coordinates to address texels of the image. When set to VK_TRUE, the range of the image coordinates used to lookup the texel is in the range of zero to the image dimensions for x, y and z. When set to VK_FALSE the range of image coordinates is zero to one. When unnormalizedCoordinates is VK_TRUE, samplers have the following requirements:
trans-unit.target: unnormalizedCoordinates 控制是否使用非规范化或规范化的纹理像素坐标来寻址图像的纹理像素。设置为 VK_TRUE 时，用于查找纹理像素的图像坐标的范围在零到x，y和z的图像尺寸的范围内。设置为 VK_FALSE 时，图像坐标范围为零到一。当 unnormalizedCoordinates 为 VK_TRUE 时，采样器具有以下要求：

trans-unit.source: usage is a bitmask describing the intended usage of the image.
trans-unit.target: usage 是描述图像预期用途的位掩码。

trans-unit.source: usage is a bitmask of VkBufferUsageFlagBits specifying allowed usages of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: usage 是VkBufferUsageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定允许的缓冲区用法。

trans-unit.source: usage is a bitmask of VkImageUsageFlagBits describing the intended usage of the image.
trans-unit.target: usage 是VkImageUsageFlagBits的位掩码，用于描述图像的预期用法。

trans-unit.source: usage is a bitmask of VkImageUsageFlagBits specifying the intended usage of the image, corresponding to VkImageCreateInfo::usage.
trans-unit.target: usage 是VkImageUsageFlagBits的位掩码，用于指定图像的预期用法，与VkImageCreateInfo :: usage 相对应。

trans-unit.source: usage only includes VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT and/or VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT
trans-unit.target: usage 仅包括 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT 和/或 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT

trans-unit.source: usagemust be a valid combination of VkBufferUsageFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: usage 必须是VkBufferUsageFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: usagemust be a valid combination of VkImageUsageFlagBits values
trans-unit.target: usage 必须是VkImageUsageFlagBits值的有效组合

trans-unit.source: usagemust not be 0
trans-unit.target: usage 一定不会 0

trans-unit.source: variableMultisampleRate indicates whether all pipelines that will be bound to a command buffer during a subpass with no attachments must have the same value for VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo::rasterizationSamples. If set to VK_TRUE, the implementation supports variable multisample rates in a subpass with no attachments. If set to VK_FALSE, then all pipelines bound in such a subpass must have the same multisample rate. This has no effect in situations where a subpass uses any attachments.
trans-unit.target: variableMultisampleRate 指示在不带附件的子传递期间将绑定到命令缓冲区的所有管道对于 VkPipelineMultisampleStateCreateInfo :: rasterizationSamples 是否必须具有相同的值。如果设置为 VK_TRUE ，则实现在不带附件的子通道中支持可变的多采样率。如果设置为 VK_FALSE ，则在此子通道中绑定的所有管道都必须具有相同的多采样率。这在子通行证使用任何附件的情况下不起作用。

trans-unit.source: vendorID is a unique identifier for the vendor (see below) of the physical device.
trans-unit.target: vendorID 是物理设备供应商的唯一标识符（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: vertexAttributeDescriptionCount is the number of vertex attribute descriptions provided in pVertexAttributeDescriptions.
trans-unit.target: vertexAttributeDescriptionCount 是pVertexAttributeDescriptions中提供的顶点属性描述的 pVertexAttributeDescriptions 。

trans-unit.source: vertexAttributeDescriptionCountmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxVertexInputAttributes
trans-unit.target: vertexAttributeDescriptionCount 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxVertexInputAttributes

trans-unit.source: vertexBindingDescriptionCount is the number of vertex binding descriptions provided in pVertexBindingDescriptions.
trans-unit.target: vertexBindingDescriptionCount 是pVertexBindingDescriptions中提供的顶点绑定描述的 pVertexBindingDescriptions 。

trans-unit.source: vertexBindingDescriptionCountmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxVertexInputBindings
trans-unit.target: vertexBindingDescriptionCount 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxVertexInputBindings

trans-unit.source: vertexCount is the number of vertices to draw.
trans-unit.target: vertexCount 是要绘制的顶点数。

trans-unit.source: vertexOffset is the value added to the vertex index before indexing into the vertex buffer.
trans-unit.target: vertexOffset 是在索引到顶点缓冲区之前添加到顶点索引的值。

trans-unit.source: vertexPipelineStoresAndAtomics indicates whether storage buffers and images support stores and atomic operations in the vertex, tessellation, and geometry shader stages. If this feature is not enabled, all storage image, storage texel buffers, and storage buffer variables used by these stages in shader modules must be decorated with the NonWriteable decoration (or the readonly memory qualifier in GLSL).
trans-unit.target: vertexPipelineStoresAndAtomics 指示存储缓冲区和图像是否支持顶点，细分和几何着色器阶段中的存储和原子操作。如果未启用此功能，则必须使用 NonWriteable 装饰（或GLSL中的 readonly 内存限定符）装饰着色器模块中这些阶段使用的所有存储映像，存储texel缓冲区和存储缓冲区变量。

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_1D
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_1D

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_1D_ARRAY
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_1D_ARRAY

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_2D
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_2D

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_2D_ARRAY
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_2D_ARRAY

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_3D
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_3D

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE

trans-unit.source: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY
trans-unit.target: viewType = VK_IMAGE_VIEW_TYPE_CUBE_ARRAY

trans-unit.source: viewType is an VkImageViewType value specifying the type of the image view.
trans-unit.target: viewType 是一个VkImageViewType值，用于指定图像视图的类型。

trans-unit.source: viewTypemust be a valid VkImageViewType value
trans-unit.target: viewType 必须是有效的VkImageViewType值

trans-unit.source: viewportBoundsRange[2] is the [minimum, maximum] range that the corners of a viewport must be contained in. This range must be at least [-2 × size, 2 × size - 1], where size = max(maxViewportDimensions[0], maxViewportDimensions[1]). See Controlling the Viewport.
trans-unit.target: viewportBoundsRange [2]是必须包含视口角的[最小，最大]范围。此范围必须至少为[-2× size ，2× size -1]，其中 size = max（ maxViewportDimensions [0 ]， maxViewportDimensions [1]）。请参见控制视口。

trans-unit.source: viewportCount is the number of viewports used by the pipeline.
trans-unit.target: viewportCount 是管道使用的视口数。

trans-unit.source: viewportCount is the number of viewports whose parameters are updated by the command.
trans-unit.target: viewportCount 是其参数由命令更新的视口数。

trans-unit.source: viewportCountmust be between 1 and VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxViewports, inclusive
trans-unit.target: viewportCount 必须介于 1 到 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxViewports 之间（含）

trans-unit.source: viewportCountmust be greater than 0
trans-unit.target: viewportCount 必须大于 0

trans-unit.source: viewportSubPixelBits is the number of bits of subpixel precision for viewport bounds. The subpixel precision that floating-point viewport bounds are interpreted at is given by this limit.
trans-unit.target: viewportSubPixelBits 是视口范围的子像素精度的位数。此限制给出了解释浮点视口边界的子像素精度。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdBindDescriptorSets causes the sets numbered [firstSet.. firstSet+descriptorSetCount-1] to use the bindings stored in pDescriptorSets[0..descriptorSetCount-1] for subsequent rendering commands (either compute or graphics, according to the pipelineBindPoint). Any bindings that were previously applied via these sets are no longer valid.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdBindDescriptorSets 使集编号[ firstSet .. firstSet + descriptorSetCount -1]使用存储在绑定 pDescriptorSets [0 .. descriptorSetCount -1]用于随后的描绘命令（或者计算或图形，根据 pipelineBindPoint ）。以前通过这些集合应用的任何绑定都不再有效。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdBlitImagemust not be used for multisampled source or destination images. Use vkCmdResolveImage for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdBlitImage 必须不能用于多采样的源或目标图像。为此，请使用vkCmdResolveImage。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdClearAttachmentscan clear multiple regions of each attachment used in the current subpass of a render pass instance. This command must be called only inside a render pass instance, and implicitly selects the images to clear based on the current framebuffer attachments and the command parameters.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdClearAttachments 可以清除渲染过程实例的当前子过程中使用的每个附件的多个区域。必须仅在渲染通道实例内部调用此命令，并基于当前帧缓冲区附件和命令参数隐式选择要清除的图像。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdCopyImage allows copying between size-compatible compressed and uncompressed internal formats. Formats are size-compatible if the element size of the uncompressed format is equal to the element size (compressed texel block size) of the compressed format. Such a copy does not perform on-the-fly compression or decompression. When copying from an uncompressed format to a compressed format, each texel of uncompressed data of the source image is copied as a raw value to the corresponding compressed texel block of the destination image. When copying from a compressed format to an uncompressed format, each compressed texel block of the source image is copied as a raw value to the corresponding texel of uncompressed data in the destination image. Thus, for example, it is legal to copy between a 128-bit uncompressed format and a compressed format which has a 128-bit sized compressed texel block representing 4×4 texels (using 8 bits per texel), or between a 64-bit uncompressed format and a compressed format which has a 64-bit sized compressed texel block representing 4×4 texels (using 4 bits per texel).
trans-unit.target: vkCmdCopyImage 允许在大小兼容的压缩和未压缩内部格式之间进行复制。如果未压缩格式的元素大小等于压缩格式的元素大小（压缩texel块大小），则格式是大小兼容的。这样的副本不会进行即时压缩或解压缩。当从未压缩格式复制到压缩格式时，源图像的每个未压缩数据的纹理像素将作为原始值复制到目标图像的相应已压缩纹理像素块。当从压缩格式复制到未压缩格式时，源图像的每个压缩纹素块都作为原始值复制到目标图像中相应的未压缩数据纹素。因此，例如在128位未压缩格式和压缩格式之间进行复制是合法的，该压缩格式具有代表4×4像素（每个texel使用8位）的128位大小的压缩texel块，或者在64位未压缩格式和压缩后的格式之间进行复制该格式具有一个表示4×4像素的64位压缩纹理像素块（每个texel使用4位）。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdCopyImagecan be used to copy image data between multisample images, but both images must have the same number of samples.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdCopyImage 可用于在多样本图像之间复制图像数据，但是两个图像必须具有相同数量的样本。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults is considered to be a transfer operation, and its writes to buffer memory must be synchronized using VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT and VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_WRITE_BIT before using the results.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults 被认为是转移操作，在使用结果之前，必须使用 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TRANSFER_BIT 和 VK_ACCESS_TRANSFER_WRITE_BIT 同步其对缓冲存储器的写入。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults is guaranteed to see the effect of previous uses of vkCmdResetQueryPool in the same queue, without any additional synchronization. Thus, the results will always reflect the most recent use of the query.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults 是保证看到的先前使用的效果 vkCmdResetQueryPool 在相同的队列中，而没有任何额外的同步。因此，结果将始终反映查询的最新用法。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdDispatchIndirect behaves similarly to vkCmdDispatch except that the parameters are read by the device from a buffer during execution. The parameters of the dispatch are encoded in a VkDispatchIndirectCommand structure taken from buffer starting at offset.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdDispatchIndirect 的行为与vkCmdDispatch相似，不同之处在于在执行期间设备从缓冲区读取参数。分派的参数在VkDispatchIndirectCommand结构中进行编码，该结构取自从 offset 开始的 buffer 。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect behaves similarly to vkCmdDrawIndexed except that the parameters are read by the device from a buffer during execution. drawCount draws are executed by the command, with parameters taken from buffer starting at offset and increasing by stride bytes for each successive draw. The parameters of each draw are encoded in an array of VkDrawIndexedIndirectCommand structures. If drawCount is less than or equal to one, stride is ignored.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdDrawIndexedIndirect 的行为与vkCmdDrawIndexed相似，不同之处在于在执行期间设备从缓冲区读取参数。 drawCount 绘制由命令执行，参数从 buffer 开始，从 offset 开始，并为每个连续绘制增加 stride 字节。每个绘图的参数都编码在VkDrawIndexedIndirectCommand结构的数组中。如果 drawCount 小于或等于1，则将忽略 stride 。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdDrawIndirect behaves similarly to vkCmdDraw except that the parameters are read by the device from a buffer during execution. drawCount draws are executed by the command, with parameters taken from buffer starting at offset and increasing by stride bytes for each successive draw. The parameters of each draw are encoded in an array of VkDrawIndirectCommand structures. If drawCount is less than or equal to one, stride is ignored.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdDrawIndirect 的行为与vkCmdDraw相似，不同之处在于在执行期间设备从缓冲区读取参数。 drawCount 绘制由命令执行，参数从 buffer 开始，从 offset 开始，并为每个连续绘制增加 stride 字节。每个绘图的参数都编码在VkDrawIndirectCommand结构的数组中。如果 drawCount 小于或等于1，则将忽略 stride 。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdFillBuffer is treated as “transfer” operation for the purposes of synchronization barriers. The VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BITmust be specified in usage of VkBufferCreateInfo in order for the buffer to be compatible with vkCmdFillBuffer.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdFillBuffer 出于同步屏障的目的，将vkCmdFillBuffer视为“传输”操作。所述 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT 必须在指定 usage 的 VkBufferCreateInfo 为了使缓冲器为与兼容 vkCmdFillBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdUpdateBuffer is only allowed outside of a render pass. This command is treated as “transfer” operation, for the purposes of synchronization barriers. The VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BITmust be specified in usage of VkBufferCreateInfo in order for the buffer to be compatible with vkCmdUpdateBuffer.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdUpdateBuffer 只允许在渲染过程之外进行。出于同步屏障的目的，此命令被视为“传输”操作。所述 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT 必须在指定 usage 的VkBufferCreateInfo为了使缓冲器为与兼容 vkCmdUpdateBuffer 。

trans-unit.source: vkCmdWriteTimestamp latches the value of the timer when all previous commands have completed executing as far as the specified pipeline stage, and writes the timestamp value to memory. When the timestamp value is written, the availability status of the query is set to available.
trans-unit.target: vkCmdWriteTimestamp 当所有先前的命令完成执行直到指定的流水线阶段时，vkCmdWriteTimestamp都会锁存计时器的值，并将时间戳值写入内存。写入时间戳记值后，查询的可用性状态将设置为可用。

trans-unit.source: vkCreateDevice verifies that extensions and features requested in the ppEnabledExtensionNames and pEnabledFeatures members of pCreateInfo, respectively, are supported by the implementation. If any requested extension is not supported, vkCreateDevicemust return VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT. If any requested feature is not supported, vkCreateDevicemust return VK_ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_PRESENT. Support for extensions can be checked before creating a device by querying vkEnumerateDeviceExtensionProperties. Support for features can similarly be checked by querying vkGetPhysicalDeviceFeatures.
trans-unit.target: vkCreateDevice 验证实现分别支持 pCreateInfo 的 ppEnabledExtensionNames 和 pEnabledFeatures 成员中请求的扩展和功能。如果不支持任何请求的扩展，则 vkCreateDevice 必须返回 VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT 。如果不支持任何请求的功能，则 vkCreateDevice 必须返回 VK_ERROR_FEATURE_NOT_PRESENT 。可以在创建设备之前通过查询vkEnumerateDeviceExtensionProperties来检查对扩展的支持。支持功能可以类似地，通过查询vkGetPhysicalDeviceFeatures进行检查。

trans-unit.source: vkCreateInstance verifies that the requested layers exist. If not, vkCreateInstance will return VK_ERROR_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT. Next vkCreateInstance verifies that the requested extensions are supported (e.g. in the implementation or in any enabled instance layer) and if any requested extension is not supported, vkCreateInstancemust return VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT. After verifying and enabling the instance layers and extensions the VkInstance object is created and returned to the application. If a requested extension is only supported by a layer, both the layer and the extension need to be specified at vkCreateInstance time for the creation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: vkCreateInstance 验证所请求的层是否存在。否则， vkCreateInstance 将返回 VK_ERROR_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT 。接下来， vkCreateInstance 验证所请求的扩展是否受支持（例如，在实现中或任何启用的实例层中），并且如果不支持任何所请求的扩展，则 vkCreateInstance 必须返回 VK_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT 。验证并启用实例层和扩展之后，将创建 VkInstance 对象，并将其返回给应用程序。如果请求的扩展仅由层支持，则该层和扩展都需要在 vkCreateInstance 上指定 创造成功的时间。

trans-unit.source: vkDeviceWaitIdle is equivalent to calling vkQueueWaitIdle for all queues owned by device.
trans-unit.target: vkDeviceWaitIdle 等同于调用 vkQueueWaitIdle 通过所拥有的所有队列 device 。

trans-unit.source: vkFlushMappedMemoryRanges guarantees that host writes to the memory ranges described by pMemoryRangescan be made available to device access, via availability operations from the VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BITaccess type.
trans-unit.target: vkFlushMappedMemoryRanges 保证主机写入由所描述的存储器范围 pMemoryRanges 可提供给设备的访问，经由可用性操作从 VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BIT 接入类型。

trans-unit.source: vkGetInstanceProcAddr itself is obtained in a platform- and loader- specific manner. Typically, the loader library will export this command as a function symbol, so applications can link against the loader library, or load it dynamically and look up the symbol using platform-specific APIs. Loaders are encouraged to export function symbols for all other core Vulkan commands as well; if this is done, then applications that use only the core Vulkan commands have no need to use vkGetInstanceProcAddr.
trans-unit.target: vkGetInstanceProcAddr 本身以特定于平台和加载程序的方式获得。通常，加载程序库会将此命令导出为功能符号，因此应用程序可以针对加载程序库进行链接，或动态加载它并使用特定于平台的API查找符号。鼓励加载程序也为所有其他核心Vulkan命令导出功能符号。如果这样做，则仅使用核心Vulkan命令的应用程序无需使用 vkGetInstanceProcAddr 。

trans-unit.source: vkGetPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatProperties returns an array of VkSparseImageFormatProperties. Each element will describe properties for one set of image aspects that are bound simultaneously in the image. This is usually one element for each aspect in the image, but for interleaved depth/stencil images there is only one element describing the combined aspects.
trans-unit.target: vkGetPhysicalDeviceSparseImageFormatProperties 返回一个VkSparseImageFormatProperties数组。每个元素将描述一组同时在图像中绑定的图像方面的属性。对于图像中的每个方面，这通常是一个元素，但是对于交错的深度/模板图像，只有一个元素描述了组合的方面。

trans-unit.source: vkInvalidateMappedMemoryRanges guarantees that device writes to the memory ranges described by pMemoryRanges, which have been made visible to the VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BIT and VK_ACCESS_HOST_READ_BITaccess types, are made visible to the host. If a range of non-coherent memory is written by the host and then invalidated without first being flushed, its contents are undefined.
trans-unit.target: vkInvalidateMappedMemoryRanges 确保设备写入由 pMemoryRanges 描述的内存范围，该范围已对 VK_ACCESS_HOST_WRITE_BIT 和 VK_ACCESS_HOST_READ_BIT 访问类型可见，并且对主机可见。如果主机写入了一定范围的非一致性内存，然后在没有先刷新的情况下使它们无效，则其内容是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: vkMapMemory does not check whether the device memory is currently in use before returning the host-accessible pointer. The application must guarantee that any previously submitted command that writes to this range has completed before the host reads from or writes to that range, and that any previously submitted command that reads from that range has completed before the host writes to that region (see here for details on fulfilling such a guarantee). If the device memory was allocated without the VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT set, these guarantees must be made for an extended range: the application must round down the start of the range to the nearest multiple of VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::nonCoherentAtomSize, and round the end of the range up to the nearest multiple of VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::nonCoherentAtomSize.
trans-unit.target: vkMapMemory 在返回主机可访问的指针之前，vkMapMemory不会检查设备内存是否正在使用中。应用程序必须确保在主机读取或写入该范围之前，已完成写入该范围的任何先前提交的命令，并且在主机写入该区域之前，已确保从该范围读取的任何先前提交的命令已完成（请参见此处）。有关履行此类保证的详细信息）。如果分配的设备内存未设置 VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_HOST_COHERENT_BIT ，则必须对扩展范围做出保证：应用程序必须将范围的首尾四舍五入到最接近的整数倍。 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: nonCoherentAtomSize ，并将范围的末端四舍五入到最接近的 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: nonCoherentAtomSize 倍数。

trans-unit.source: vkMapMemory will fail if the implementation is unable to allocate an appropriately sized contiguous virtual address range, e.g. due to virtual address space fragmentation or platform limits. In such cases, vkMapMemorymust return VK_ERROR_MEMORY_MAP_FAILED. The application can improve the likelihood of success by reducing the size of the mapped range and/or removing unneeded mappings using VkUnmapMemory.
trans-unit.target: vkMapMemory 如果实现无法分配适当大小的连续虚拟地址范围（例如由于虚拟地址空间碎片或平台限制），则vkMapMemory将失败。在这种情况下， vkMapMemory 必须返回 VK_ERROR_MEMORY_MAP_FAILED 。该应用程序可以通过减小映射范围的大小和/或使用 VkUnmapMemory 删除不需要的映射来提高成功的可能性。

trans-unit.source: vkQueueBindSparse is a queue submission command, with each batch defined by an element of pBindInfo as an instance of the VkBindSparseInfo structure. Batches begin execution in the order they appear in pBindInfo, but may complete out of order.
trans-unit.target: vkQueueBindSparse 是一个队列提交命令，每个批处理都由 pBindInfo 的元素定义为VkBindSparseInfo结构的实例。批处理按照它们在 pBindInfo 中出现的顺序开始执行，但是可能会不按顺序完成。

trans-unit.source: vkQueueSubmit is a queue submission command, with each batch defined by an element of pSubmits as an instance of the VkSubmitInfo structure. Batches begin execution in the order they appear in pSubmits, but may complete out of order.
trans-unit.target: vkQueueSubmit 是一个队列提交命令，每个批处理都由 pSubmits 的一个元素定义为VkSubmitInfo结构的实例。批处理按照它们在 pSubmits 中出现的顺序开始执行，但可能会无序完成。

trans-unit.source: vkQueueWaitIdle is equivalent to submitting a fence to a queue and waiting with an infinite timeout for that fence to signal.
trans-unit.target: vkQueueWaitIdle 等效于将围栅提交到队列，并等待无限超时以使该围栅发出信号。

trans-unit.source: waitAll is the condition that must be satisfied to successfully unblock the wait. If waitAll is VK_TRUE, then the condition is that all fences in pFences are signaled. Otherwise, the condition is that at least one fence in pFences is signaled.
trans-unit.target: waitAll 是成功解除阻塞等待所必须满足的条件。如果 waitAll 为 VK_TRUE ，则条件是发出所有 pFences 围栏信号。否则，条件是至少发出了一个 pFences 围栏信号。

trans-unit.source: waitSemaphoreCount is the number of semaphores upon which to wait before executing the command buffers for the batch.
trans-unit.target: waitSemaphoreCount 是执行批处理的命令缓冲区之前要等待的信号量。

trans-unit.source: waitSemaphoreCount is the number of semaphores upon which to wait before executing the sparse binding operations for the batch.
trans-unit.target: waitSemaphoreCount 是对批处理执行稀疏绑定操作之前要等待的信号量。

trans-unit.source: wideLines indicates whether lines with width other than 1.0 are supported. If this feature is not enabled, the lineWidth member of the VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo structure must be set to 1.0 unless the VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_LINE_WIDTH dynamic state is enabled, and the lineWidth parameter to vkCmdSetLineWidthmust be set to 1.0. When this feature is supported, the range and granularity of supported line widths are indicated by the lineWidthRange and lineWidthGranularity members of the VkPhysicalDeviceLimits structure, respectively.
trans-unit.target: wideLines 指示是否支持宽度非1.0的线。如果未启用此功能，则必须将 VkPipelineRasterizationStateCreateInfo 结构的 lineWidth 成员设置为1.0，除非启用了 VK_DYNAMIC_STATE_LINE_WIDTH 动态状态，并且 vkCmdSetLineWidth 的 lineWidth 参数必须设置为1.0。当支持此功能时，所支持的线宽的范围和粒度分别由 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits 结构的 lineWidthRange 和 lineWidthGranularity 成员指示。

trans-unit.source: width ≥ 1
trans-unit.target: width ≥1

trans-unit.source: width = ci.extent.width
trans-unit.target: width = ci extent.width

trans-unit.source: width and height are the viewport’s width and height, respectively.
trans-unit.target: width 和 height 分别是视口的宽度和高度。

trans-unit.source: width is the width of the extent.
trans-unit.target: width 是范围的宽度。

trans-unit.source: width of a VkExtent3D parameter must be an integer multiple of Ax, or else x + widthmust equal the width of the image subresource corresponding to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: width a的VkExtent3D参数必须是整数倍的X，或者 x + width 必须等于对应于该参数的子资源图像的宽度。

trans-unit.source: width, height and layers define the dimensions of the framebuffer.
trans-unit.target: width ， height 和 layers 定义了帧缓冲区的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: widthmust be greater than 0.0 and less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxViewportDimensions[0]
trans-unit.target: width 必须大于 0.0 且小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxViewportDimensions [0]

trans-unit.source: widthmust be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: width 必须大于 0 。

trans-unit.source: widthmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxFramebufferWidth
trans-unit.target: width 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxFramebufferWidth

trans-unit.source: writeMask is the new value to use as the stencil write mask.
trans-unit.target: writeMask 是用作模板写掩码的新值。

trans-unit.source: writeMask selects the bits of the unsigned integer stencil values updated by the stencil test in the stencil framebuffer attachment.
trans-unit.target: writeMask 选择由模板测试在模板帧缓冲区附件中更新的无符号整数模板值的位。

trans-unit.source: x and y are the viewport’s upper left corner (x,y).
trans-unit.target: x 和 y 是视口的左上角（x，y）。

trans-unit.source: x and ymust each be between viewportBoundsRange[0] and viewportBoundsRange[1], inclusive
trans-unit.target: x 和 y 必须分别在 viewportBoundsRange [0]和 viewportBoundsRange [1]之间（包括两端）

trans-unit.source: x is the number of local workgroups to dispatch in the X dimension.
trans-unit.target: x 是要在X维度上分派的本地工作组的数量。

trans-unit.source: x is the x offset.
trans-unit.target: x 是x偏移量。

trans-unit.source: x, y, and z of a VkOffset3D parameter must be integer multiples of Ax, Ay, and Az, respectively.
trans-unit.target: x ， y ，和 z 一个的VkOffset3D参数必须是整数A的倍数X，A ÿ，和A Ž，分别。

trans-unit.source: xmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxComputeWorkGroupCount[0]
trans-unit.target: x 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxComputeWorkGroupCount [0]

trans-unit.source: y is the number of local workgroups to dispatch in the Y dimension.
trans-unit.target: y 是要在Y维度上分派的本地工作组的数量。

trans-unit.source: y is the y offset.
trans-unit.target: y 是y偏移量。

trans-unit.source: ymust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxComputeWorkGroupCount[1]
trans-unit.target: y 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxComputeWorkGroupCount [1]

trans-unit.source: z is the number of local workgroups to dispatch in the Z dimension.
trans-unit.target: z 是要在Z维度上分派的本地工作组的数量。

trans-unit.source: z is the z offset.
trans-unit.target: z 是z偏移量。

trans-unit.source: zmust be less than or equal to VkPhysicalDeviceLimits::maxComputeWorkGroupCount[2]
trans-unit.target: z 必须小于或等于 VkPhysicalDeviceLimits :: maxComputeWorkGroupCount [2]

trans-unit.source: N ≥ 1
trans-unit.target: Ñ ≥1

trans-unit.source: Primitive topology determines how consecutive vertices are organized into primitives, and determines the type of primitive that is used at the beginning of the graphics pipeline. The effective topology for later stages of the pipeline is altered by tessellation or geometry shading (if either is in use) and depends on the execution modes of those shaders. Supported topologies are defined by VkPrimitiveTopology and include:
trans-unit.target: 图元拓扑确定连续的顶点如何组织成图元，并确定在图形管线开始时使用的图元类型。通过细分或几何体着色（如果正在使用两者）来更改流水线后期的有效拓扑，并取决于这些着色器的执行模式。支持的拓扑由VkPrimitiveTopology定义，包括：

trans-unit.source: Shader modules contain shader code and one or more entry points. Shaders are selected from a shader module by specifying an entry point as part of pipeline creation. The stages of a pipeline can use shaders that come from different modules. The shader code defining a shader module must be in the SPIR-V format, as described by the Vulkan Environment for SPIR-V appendix.
trans-unit.target: 着色器模块包含着色器代码和一个或多个入口点。通过在管道创建过程中指定一个入口点，从着色器模块中选择着色器。流水线的各个阶段可以使用来自不同模块的着色器。定义着色器模块的着色器代码必须为SPIR-V格式，如Vulkan Environment for SPIR-V附录所述。

trans-unit.source: A buffer view represents a contiguous range of a buffer and a specific format to be used to interpret the data. Buffer views are used to enable shaders to access buffer contents interpreted as formatted data. In order to create a valid buffer view, the buffer must have been created with at least one of the following usage flags:
trans-unit.target: 甲缓冲器视图表示要用于解释数据的缓冲器和一个特定的格式的连续范围。缓冲区视图用于使着色器访问解释为格式化数据的缓冲区内容。为了创建有效的缓冲区视图，必须至少使用以下使用标志之一创建缓冲区：

trans-unit.source: A descriptor pool maintains a pool of descriptors, from which descriptor sets are allocated. Descriptor pools are externally synchronized, meaning that the application must not allocate and/or free descriptor sets from the same pool in multiple threads simultaneously.
trans-unit.target: 一个描述符池维护的描述符池，从中分配的描述符集。描述符池是外部同步的，这意味着应用程序不得同时从多个线程中的同一池中分配和/或释放描述符集。

trans-unit.source: A render pass represents a collection of attachments, subpasses, and dependencies between the subpasses, and describes how the attachments are used over the course of the subpasses. The use of a render pass in a command buffer is a render pass instance.
trans-unit.target: 一个渲染过程代表附件，subpasses和subpasses之间的依赖关系的集合，并描述了附件如何在subpasses的过程中使用。在命令缓冲区中使用渲染通道是渲染通道实例。

trans-unit.source: A = A<sub>d</sub> × D<sub>a</sub> - A<sub>s0</sub> × S<sub>a</sub>
trans-unit.target: A = A <sub>d</sub> ×D <sub>a</sub> -A <sub>s0</sub> ×S <sub>a</sub>

trans-unit.source: A = A<sub>s0</sub> × S<sub>a</sub> + A<sub>d</sub> × D<sub>a</sub>
trans-unit.target: A = A <sub>s0</sub> ×S <sub>a</sub> + A <sub>d</sub> ×D <sub>a</sub>

trans-unit.source: A Vulkan device operates on data in device memory via memory objects that are represented in the API by a VkDeviceMemory handle.
trans-unit.target: Vulkan设备通过内存对象对设备内存中的数据进行操作，这些对象在API中由 VkDeviceMemory 句柄表示。

trans-unit.source: A buffer access is considered to be out of bounds if any of the following are true:
trans-unit.target: 如果以下任何一项为真,缓冲区访问将被视为越界。

trans-unit.target: 标志的集合由使用 VkFlags 类型的位掩码表示：

trans-unit.source: A compatible descriptor set must be bound for all set numbers that any shaders in a pipeline access, at the time that a draw or dispatch command is recorded to execute using that pipeline. However, if none of the shaders in a pipeline statically use any bindings with a particular set number, then no descriptor set need be bound for that set number, even if the pipeline layout includes a non-trivial descriptor set layout for that set number.
trans-unit.target: 在记录绘制或分派命令以使用该管道执行时，必须为管道中任何着色器访问的所有设定编号绑定一个兼容的描述符集。但是，如果管道中的所有着色器都不静态地使用具有特定集合号的任何绑定，则即使该管道编号包括该集合号的非平凡描述符集合布局，也不需要为该集合号绑定任何描述符集。

trans-unit.source: A descriptor set layout object is defined by an array of zero or more descriptor bindings. Each individual descriptor binding is specified by a descriptor type, a count (array size) of the number of descriptors in the binding, a set of shader stages that can access the binding, and (if using immutable samplers) an array of sampler descriptors.
trans-unit.target: 描述符集布局对象由零个或多个描述符绑定的数组定义。每个单独的描述符绑定由描述符类型，绑定中描述符数量的计数（数组大小），一组可以访问绑定的着色器阶段以及（如果使用不可变采样器）采样器描述符数组指定。

trans-unit.source: A queue family can take ownership of an image subresource or buffer range of a resource created with VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE, without an ownership transfer, in the same way as for a resource that was just created; however, taking ownership in this way has the effect that the contents of the image subresource or buffer range are undefined.
trans-unit.target: 队列族可以像使用 VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE 创建的资源一样，获取使用VK_SHARING_MODE_EXCLUSIVE创建的图像子资源或资源的缓冲区范围的所有权，而无需所有权转移。但是，以这种方式取得所有权的结果是，未定义图像子资源或缓冲区范围的内容。

trans-unit.target: 必须使用 VK_PIPELINE_BIND_POINT_COMPUTE 将有效的计算管道绑定到当前命令缓冲区

trans-unit.source: Access to descriptor sets from a pipeline is accomplished through a pipeline layout. Zero or more descriptor set layouts and zero or more push constant ranges are combined to form a pipeline layout object which describes the complete set of resources that can be accessed by a pipeline. The pipeline layout represents a sequence of descriptor sets with each having a specific layout. This sequence of layouts is used to determine the interface between shader stages and shader resources. Each pipeline is created using a pipeline layout.
trans-unit.target: 通过管道布局可以从管道访问描述符集。零个或多个描述符集布局和零个或多个推入常量范围组合在一起，形成一个管道布局对象，该对象描述了可以由管道访问的资源的完整集合。流水线布局代表一系列描述符集，每个描述符集都有特定的布局。此布局顺序用于确定着色器阶段和着色器资源之间的接口。每个管道都是使用管道布局创建的。

trans-unit.source: Access types that can be set in an access mask include:
trans-unit.target: 可以在访问掩码中设置的访问类型包括：

trans-unit.source: Additional information about fence and semaphore operation is described in the synchronization chapter.
trans-unit.target: 同步一章中介绍了有关篱笆和信号灯操作的其他信息。

trans-unit.source: Additional information about the pool is passed in an instance of the VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo structure:
trans-unit.target: 有关池的其他信息在 VkDescriptorPoolCreateInfo 结构的实例中传递：

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to vkFreeDescriptorSets, all descriptor sets in pDescriptorSets are invalid.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用后 vkFreeDescriptorSets ，所有的描述符集在 pDescriptorSets 无效。

trans-unit.source: After beginning a query, that query is considered active within the command buffer it was called in until that same query is ended. Queries active in a primary command buffer when secondary command buffers are executed are considered active for those secondary command buffers.
trans-unit.target: 开始查询后，该查询在调用它的命令缓冲区内被认为是活动的，直到该查询结束。当执行辅助命令缓冲区时，在主命令缓冲区中处于活动状态的查询被视为对那些辅助命令缓冲区处于活动状态。

trans-unit.source: After beginning a render pass instance, the command buffer is ready to record the commands for the first subpass of that render pass.
trans-unit.target: 在开始渲染通道实例后,命令缓冲区已准备好记录该渲染通道的第一个子通道的命令。

trans-unit.source: After filtering, the float values are first clamped and then cast to the destination image format. In case of sRGB destination format, linear RGB values are converted to nonlinear representation before writing the pixel to the image.
trans-unit.target: 滤波后,首先对浮动值进行钳制,然后投射到目标图像格式。如果是sRGB目的格式,线性RGB值在写入图像之前被转换为非线性表示。

trans-unit.source: After transitioning to the next subpass, the application can record the commands for that subpass.
trans-unit.target: 过渡到下一个子通道后，应用程序可以记录该子通道的命令。

trans-unit.source: After verifying and enabling the extensions the VkDevice object is created and returned to the application. If a requested extension is only supported by a layer, both the layer and the extension need to be specified at vkCreateInstance time for the creation to succeed.
trans-unit.target: 验证并启用扩展后，将创建 VkDevice 对象并将其返回给应用程序。如果请求的扩展仅由层支持，则需要在 vkCreateInstance 时同时指定该层和扩展，以使创建成功。

trans-unit.source: All queue submission commands that refer to fencemust have completed execution
trans-unit.target: 所有引用 fence 的队列提交命令必须已完成执行

trans-unit.source: All required extensions for each extension in the VkDeviceCreateInfo::ppEnabledExtensionNames list must also be present in that list.
trans-unit.target: 所有必需的扩展在每个分机VkDeviceCreateInfo :: ppEnabledExtensionNames 列表必须也出现在该列表中。

trans-unit.source: All required extensions for each extension in the VkInstanceCreateInfo::ppEnabledExtensionNames list must also be present in that list.
trans-unit.target: 所有必需的扩展在每个分机VkInstanceCreateInfo :: ppEnabledExtensionNames 列表必须也出现在该列表中。

trans-unit.source: All VkCommandBuffer objects allocated from commandPoolmust not be in the pending state
trans-unit.target: 所有 VkCommandBuffer 对象从分配 commandPool 一定不能在挂起状态

trans-unit.source: All VkCommandBuffer objects allocated from commandPoolmust not be in the pending state.
trans-unit.target: 所有 VkCommandBuffer 对象从分配 commandPool 一定不能在待定状态。

trans-unit.source: All attachments in pColorAttachments that are not VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSEDmust have the same sample count
trans-unit.target: pColorAttachments 中所有非 VK_ATTACHMENT_UNUSED 的附件必须具有相同的样本数

trans-unit.source: All child objects created on devicemust have been destroyed prior to destroying device
trans-unit.target: 在销毁 device 之前，必须销毁在 device 创建的所有子对象

trans-unit.source: All child objects created using instancemust have been destroyed prior to destroying instance
trans-unit.target: 使用 instance 创建的所有子对象必须在销毁 instance 之前已销毁

trans-unit.source: All commands that are allowed on a queue that supports transfer operations are also allowed on a queue that supports either graphics or compute operations. Thus, if the capabilities of a queue family include VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT or VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT, then reporting the VK_QUEUE_TRANSFER_BIT capability separately for that queue family is optional.
trans-unit.target: 支持图形操作或计算操作的队列上还允许支持传输操作的队列上允许的所有命令。因此，如果队列系列的功能包括 VK_QUEUE_GRAPHICS_BIT 或 VK_QUEUE_COMPUTE_BIT ，则分别报告该队列系列的 VK_QUEUE_TRANSFER_BIT 功能是可选的。

trans-unit.source: All consecutive bindings updated via a single VkWriteDescriptorSet structure, except those with a descriptorCount of zero, must all either use immutable samplers or must all not use immutable samplers.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个单一的更新所有连续绑定 VkWriteDescriptorSet 结构，除了那些 descriptorCount 为零，必须全部要么使用一成不变的采样或者必须全部不能用一成不变的采样。

trans-unit.source: All consecutive bindings updated via a single VkWriteDescriptorSet structure, except those with a descriptorCount of zero, must have identical descriptorType and stageFlags.
trans-unit.target: 通过一个 VkWriteDescriptorSet 结构更新的所有连续绑定（ descriptorCount 为零的绑定除外）必须具有相同的 descriptorType 和 stageFlags 。

trans-unit.source: All elements of pBuffersmust have been created with the VK_BUFFER_USAGE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT flag
trans-unit.target: 必须使用 VK_BUFFER_USAGE_VERTEX_BUFFER_BIT 标志创建 pBuffers 的所有元素

trans-unit.source: All elements of pCommandBuffersmust not be in the pending state
trans-unit.target: 的所有元素 pCommandBuffers 一定不能在挂起状态

trans-unit.source: All elements of pOffsetsmust be less than the size of the corresponding element in pBuffers
trans-unit.target: pOffsets 的所有元素必须小于 pBuffers 中相应元素的大小

trans-unit.source: All elements of pVertexAttributeDescriptionsmust describe distinct attribute locations
trans-unit.target: 的所有元素 pVertexAttributeDescriptions 必须描述不同的属性位置

trans-unit.source: All elements of pVertexBindingDescriptionsmust describe distinct binding numbers
trans-unit.target: pVertexBindingDescriptions 的所有元素必须描述不同的绑定号

trans-unit.source: All elements of the pWaitSemaphores member of all elements of pBindInfomust be semaphores that are signaled, or have semaphore signal operations previously submitted for execution.
trans-unit.target: 在所有元素 pWaitSemaphores 的所有元素的成员 pBindInfo 必须是有信号的信号，否则有旗语信号操作之前执行提交。

trans-unit.source: All elements of the pWaitSemaphores member of all elements of pSubmitsmust be semaphores that are signaled, or have semaphore signal operations previously submitted for execution.
trans-unit.target: 在所有元素 pWaitSemaphores 的所有元素的成员 pSubmits 必须是有信号的信号，否则有旗语信号操作之前执行提交。

trans-unit.target: 进行的所有查询活动的记录过程 commandBuffer 必须已处于非活动状态

trans-unit.target: 所有提交的涉及 semaphore 批处理必须已完成执行

trans-unit.target: 所有提交的引用 renderPass 的命令必须已完成执行

trans-unit.target: 所有提交的引用 sampler 命令必须已完成执行

trans-unit.target: 所有提交的引用 pDescriptorSets 的任何元素的命令都必须已完成执行

trans-unit.source: All uses of descriptorPool (via any allocated descriptor sets) must have completed execution
trans-unit.target: 所有使用 descriptorPool （通过任何分配的描述符集）必须已完成执行

trans-unit.source: All values returned from a Vulkan implementation in a VkBool32 will be either VK_TRUE or VK_FALSE.
trans-unit.target: 从 VkBool32 中的Vulkan实现返回的所有值将是 VK_TRUE 或 VK_FALSE 。

trans-unit.source: All vertex input bindings accessed via vertex input variables declared in the vertex shader entry point’s interface must have valid buffers bound
trans-unit.target: 通过在顶点着色器入口点的接口中声明的顶点输入变量访问的所有顶点输入绑定必须绑定有效缓冲区

trans-unit.source: Allocations returned by vkAllocateMemory are guaranteed to meet any alignment requirement by the implementation. For example, if an implementation requires 128 byte alignment for images and 64 byte alignment for buffers, the device memory returned through this mechanism would be 128-byte aligned. This ensures that applications can correctly suballocate objects of different types (with potentially different alignment requirements) in the same memory object.
trans-unit.target: vkAllocateMemory 返回的分配可以保证实现满足任何对齐要求。例如，如果一个实现要求图像的128字节对齐和缓冲区的64字节对齐，则通过此机制返回的设备内存将是128字节对齐。这样可以确保应用程序可以在同一内存对象中正确地对不同类型的对象（可能具有不同的对齐要求）进行子分配。

trans-unit.source: Allocators are provided by the application as a pointer to a VkAllocationCallbacks structure:
trans-unit.target: 应用程序将分配器作为指向 VkAllocationCallbacks 结构的指针提供：

trans-unit.source: Alpha Blend Factor (S<sub>a</sub> or D<sub>a</sub>)
trans-unit.target: Alpha混合因子（S <sub>a</sub>或D <sub>a</sub>）

trans-unit.source: Alpha Component
trans-unit.target: 阿尔法组件

trans-unit.source: An “available extension” is an extension function supported by any of the loader, driver or layer.
trans-unit.target: “可用扩展”是任何加载器，驱动程序或层支持的扩展功能。

trans-unit.source: An execution dependency with only VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT in the destination stage mask will only prevent that stage from executing in subsequently submitted commands. As this stage does not perform any actual execution, this is not observable - in effect, it does not delay processing of subsequent commands. Similarly an execution dependency with only VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT in the source stage mask will effectively not wait for any prior commands to complete.
trans-unit.target: 目标阶段掩码中仅具有 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_BOTTOM_OF_PIPE_BIT 的执行依赖项将仅阻止该阶段在后续提交的命令中执行。由于此阶段不执行任何实际执行，因此无法观察到-实际上，它不会延迟后续命令的处理。同样，在源阶段掩码中仅具有 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_TOP_OF_PIPE_BIT 的执行依赖项将有效地不等待任何先前的命令完成。

trans-unit.source: Any
trans-unit.target: Any

trans-unit.source: Any secondary command buffers recorded into any given element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmitsmust be in the pending or executable state.
trans-unit.target: 记录到 pCommandBuffers 的任何元素的pCommandBuffers成员的任何给定元素中的所有辅助命令缓冲区 pSubmits 必须处于挂起或可执行状态。

trans-unit.source: Any VkImageView being sampled with VK_FILTER_LINEAR as a result of this command must be of a format which supports linear filtering, as specified by the VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT flag in VkFormatProperties::linearTilingFeatures (for a linear image) or VkFormatProperties::optimalTilingFeatures(for an optimally tiled image) returned by vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties
trans-unit.target: 任何 VkImageView 被与采样 VK_FILTER_LINEAR 作为此命令的结果必须是支持线性滤波的格式的，由指定 VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_LINEAR_BIT 在标志 VkFormatProperties :: linearTilingFeatures （为一个线性图像）或 VkFormatProperties :: optimalTilingFeatures （对于最佳平铺图像）由 vkGetPhysicalDeviceFormatProperties 返回

trans-unit.source: Any access flag included in dstAccessMaskmust be supported by one of the pipeline stages in dstStageMask, as specified in the table of supported access types.
trans-unit.target: dstAccessMask 中包含的任何访问标志都必须由dstStageMask中的管道阶段之一 dstStageMask ，如支持的访问类型表中所指定。

trans-unit.source: Any access flag included in srcAccessMaskmust be supported by one of the pipeline stages in srcStageMask, as specified in the table of supported access types.
trans-unit.target: srcAccessMask 中包含的任何访问标志都必须由srcStageMask中的管线阶段之一 srcStageMask ，如支持的访问类型表中所指定。

trans-unit.source: Any calls to vkCmdSetEvent, vkCmdResetEvent or vkCmdWaitEvents that have been recorded into any of the command buffer elements of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmits, must not reference any VkEvent that is referenced by any of those commands in a command buffer that has been submitted to another queue and is still in the pending state.
trans-unit.target: 到任何呼叫vkCmdSetEvent，vkCmdResetEvent或vkCmdWaitEvents已被记录到任何的命令缓冲器元件的 pCommandBuffers 的任何元件的构件 pSubmits ，必须不引用任何VkEvent由任何已提交的命令缓冲区的那些命令的引用到另一个队列，并且仍处于挂起状态。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachments that is used as a color attachment or resolve attachment by renderPassmust have been created with a usage value including VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pAttachments 被用作由颜色附件或附件的决心 renderPass 必须已经创建的 usage 值，包括 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachments that is used as a depth/stencil attachment by renderPassmust have been created with a usage value including VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pAttachments 被用作由深度/模板附着 renderPass 必须已经创建的 usage 值，包括 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachments that is used as an input attachment by renderPassmust have been created with a usage value including VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pAttachments 被用作由输入附件 renderPass 必须已经创建的 usage 值，包括 VK_IMAGE_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachmentsmust have been created with a samples value that matches the samples value specified by the corresponding VkAttachmentDescription in renderPass
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pAttachments 必须已经创建的 samples 值相匹配的 samples 值由相应的指定 VkAttachmentDescription 在 renderPass

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachmentsmust have been created with an VkFormat value that matches the VkFormat specified by the corresponding VkAttachmentDescription in renderPass
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pAttachments 必须已用创建VkFormat该匹配值VkFormat由相应的指定 VkAttachmentDescription 在 renderPass

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachmentsmust have been created with the identity swizzle
trans-unit.target: pAttachments 的任何给定元素必须已使用身份标识创建

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachmentsmust have dimensions at least as large as the corresponding framebuffer dimension
trans-unit.target: pAttachments 的任何给定元素的尺寸必须至少与相应的帧缓冲区尺寸一样大

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pAttachmentsmust only specify a single mip level
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pAttachments 必须只能指定一个MIP水平

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pCommandBuffersmust be in the pending or executable state.
trans-unit.target: pCommandBuffers 的任何给定元素必须处于挂起或可执行状态。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pCommandBuffersmust have been allocated from a VkCommandPool that was created for the same queue family as the VkCommandPool from which commandBuffer was allocated
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pCommandBuffers 必须已经从分配 VkCommandPool 这是对同一队列家庭为创建 VkCommandPool 从 commandBuffer 被分配

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pCommandBuffersmust have been allocated with a level of VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pCommandBuffers 必须已经分配了 level 的 VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pCommandBuffersmust not begin any query types that are active in commandBuffer
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pCommandBuffers 一定不会开始作为任何查询类型活跃在 commandBuffer

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pCommandBuffersmust not have been allocated with VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY
trans-unit.target: pCommandBuffers 的任何给定元素一定不能已经用 VK_COMMAND_BUFFER_LEVEL_SECONDARY 分配

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pDescriptorSetsmust have been allocated with a VkDescriptorSetLayout that matches (is the same as, or identically defined as) the VkDescriptorSetLayout at set n in layout, where n is the sum of firstSet and the index into pDescriptorSets
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pDescriptorSets 必须已经被分配有 VkDescriptorSetLayout 匹配（相同，或相同地定义为）的 VkDescriptorSetLayout 在集Ñ在 layout ，其中Ñ是的总和 firstSet 和索引 pDescriptorSets

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pDynamicOffsetsmust satisfy the required alignment for the corresponding descriptor binding’s descriptor type
trans-unit.target: pDynamicOffsets 的任何给定元素必须满足相应描述符绑定的描述符类型的所需对齐方式

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pFencesmust not currently be associated with any queue command that has not yet completed execution on that queue
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pFences 必须当前未与尚未完成该队列执行的任何队列命令相关联

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pMemoryBarriers, pBufferMemoryBarriers or pImageMemoryBarriersmust not have any access flag included in its dstAccessMask member if that bit is not supported by any of the pipeline stages in dstStageMask, as specified in the table of supported access types.
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pMemoryBarriers ， pBufferMemoryBarriers 或 pImageMemoryBarriers 必须不具有包括在其任何访问标志 dstAccessMask 构件如果该位不被任何在流水线级的支持 dstStageMask 作为指定，支持的接入类型的表。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pMemoryBarriers, pBufferMemoryBarriers or pImageMemoryBarriersmust not have any access flag included in its srcAccessMask member if that bit is not supported by any of the pipeline stages in srcStageMask, as specified in the table of supported access types.
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pMemoryBarriers ， pBufferMemoryBarriers 或 pImageMemoryBarriers 必须不具有包括在其任何访问标志 srcAccessMask 构件如果该位不被任何在流水线级的支持 srcStageMask 作为指定，支持的接入类型的表。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pPreserveAttachmentsmust not also be an element of any other member of the subpass description
trans-unit.target: 的任何给定元件 pPreserveAttachments 必须不能同时是subpass描述的任何其他成员的元件

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pResolveAttachmentsmust have a sample count of VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pResolveAttachments 必须有一个样本计数 VK_SAMPLE_COUNT_1_BIT

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pResolveAttachmentsmust have the same VkFormat as its corresponding color attachment
trans-unit.target: pResolveAttachments 的任何给定元素必须具有与其对应的颜色附件相同的VkFormat

trans-unit.source: Any given element of pWaitDstStageMaskmust not include VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT.
trans-unit.target: 任何给定的元素 pWaitDstStageMask 必须不包括 VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_HOST_BIT 。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmitsmust be in the pending or executable state.
trans-unit.target: pCommandBuffers 的任何元素的pCommandBuffers成员的任何给定元素 pSubmits 必须处于挂起或可执行状态。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of the pCommandBuffers member of any element of pSubmitsmust have been allocated from a VkCommandPool that was created for the same queue family queue belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 在任何给定的元素 pCommandBuffers 的任何元素的成员 pSubmits 必须已经从分配 VkCommandPool 已创建了同一个队列家庭 queue 属于。

trans-unit.source: Any given element of the pSignalSemaphores member of any element of pBindInfomust be unsignaled when the semaphore signal operation it defines is executed on the device
trans-unit.target: 所述的任何给定元件 pSignalSemaphores 的任何元件的构件 pBindInfo 必须在设备上执行它定义的旗语信号操作是unsignaled

trans-unit.source: Any given element of the pSignalSemaphores member of any element of pSubmitsmust be unsignaled when the semaphore signal operation it defines is executed on the device
trans-unit.target: 所述的任何给定元件 pSignalSemaphores 的任何元件的构件 pSubmits 必须在设备上执行它定义的旗语信号操作是unsignaled

trans-unit.source: Any pipeline stage included in srcStageMask or dstStageMaskmust be supported by the capabilities of the queue family specified by the queueFamilyIndex member of the VkCommandPoolCreateInfo structure that was used to create the VkCommandPool that commandBuffer was allocated from, as specified in the table of supported pipeline stages.
trans-unit.target: 包含在任一流水线级 srcStageMask 或 dstStageMask 必须由指定的队列系列的功能来支持 queueFamilyIndex 所述的构件VkCommandPoolCreateInfo这是用于创建结构 VkCommandPool 该 commandBuffer 从分配，如在指定的支持流水线级的表。

trans-unit.source: Any primary command buffer allocated from another VkCommandPool that is in the recording or executable state and has a secondary command buffer allocated from commandPool recorded into it, becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 从处于记录或可执行状态的另一个VkCommandPool分配的任何主命令缓冲区都将变为无效，该VkCommandPool处于已记录状态或可执行状态，并且已从 commandPool 分配了辅助命令缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Any primary command buffer that is in the recording or executable state and has commandBuffer recorded into it, becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 任何处于记录或可执行状态并且已记录 commandBuffer 的主命令缓冲区都将变为invalid。

trans-unit.source: Any primary command buffer that is in the recording or executable state and has any element of pCommandBuffers recorded into it, becomes invalid.
trans-unit.target: 任何处于记录或可执行状态且具有 pCommandBuffers 元素记录在其中的主命令缓冲区都将变为invalid。

trans-unit.source: Any stage flag included in any element of the pWaitDstStageMask member of any element of pSubmitsmust be a pipeline stage supported by one of the capabilities of queue, as specified in the table of supported pipeline stages.
trans-unit.target: 包含在中的任何元素的任何阶段标志 pWaitDstStageMask 的任何元件的构件 pSubmits 必须是一个流水线级的通过的能力支持一个 queue ，在指定的支持流水线级的表。

trans-unit.source: Any triangle which is not front-facing is back-facing, including zero-area triangles.
trans-unit.target: 凡不是正面的三角形都是背面的,包括零面积三角形。

trans-unit.source: Any two elements of pPushConstantRangesmust not include the same stage in stageFlags
trans-unit.target: 的任意两个元素 pPushConstantRanges 必须不包括在同一阶段 stageFlags

trans-unit.source: Applications can double-buffer query pool usage, with a pool per frame, and reset queries at the end of the frame in which they are read.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以对查询池的使用情况进行双缓冲，每帧有一个池，并在读取它们的帧的末尾重置查询。

trans-unit.source: Applications can store the data retrieved from the pipeline cache, and use these data, possibly in a future run of the application, to populate new pipeline cache objects. The results of pipeline compiles, however, may depend on the vendor ID, device ID, driver version, and other details of the device. To enable applications to detect when previously retrieved data is incompatible with the device, the initial bytes written to pDatamust be a header consisting of the following members:
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以存储从管道缓存中检索到的数据，并在以后的应用程序运行中使用这些数据来填充新的管道缓存对象。但是，管道编译的结果可能取决于供应商ID，设备ID，驱动程序版本和设备的其他详细信息。为了使应用程序能够检测先前检索到的数据何时与设备不兼容，写入 pData 的初始字节必须是由以下成员组成的标头：

trans-unit.source: Applications can track and manage the total host memory size of a pipeline cache object using the pAllocator. Applications can limit the amount of data retrieved from a pipeline cache object in vkGetPipelineCacheData. Implementations should not internally limit the total number of entries added to a pipeline cache object or the total host memory consumed.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以使用 pAllocator 跟踪和管理管道缓存对象的总主机内存大小。应用程序可以限制从 vkGetPipelineCacheData 中的管道缓存对象检索的数据量。实现不应在内部限制添加到管道缓存对象中的条目总数或消耗的主机内存总量。

trans-unit.source: Applications must not pass any other values than VK_TRUE or VK_FALSE into a Vulkan implementation where a VkBool32 is expected.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须不能通过比任何其他值 VK_TRUE 或 VK_FALSE 成福尔康实现，其中一个 VkBool32 预期。

trans-unit.source: Applications must take care to ensure that use of the VK_QUERY_RESULT_WAIT_BIT bit has the desired effect.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序必须注意确保使用 VK_QUERY_RESULT_WAIT_BIT 位具有预期的效果。

trans-unit.source: Applications should be careful to avoid race conditions when using events. There is no direct ordering guarantee between a vkCmdResetEvent command and a vkCmdWaitEvents command submitted after it, so some other execution dependency must be included between these commands (e.g. a semaphore).
trans-unit.target: 应用程序在使用事件时应小心避免出现竞争状况。有一间没有直接订购保证vkCmdResetEvent命令和vkCmdWaitEvents命令后提交的，所以其他一些执行依赖性必须包含这些命令之间（如信号量）。

trans-unit.source: Applications should check for a negative return value when allocating new descriptor sets, assume that any error effectively means VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL, and try to create a new descriptor pool. If VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL is the actual return value, it adds certainty to that decision.
trans-unit.target: 分配新的描述符集时，应用程序应检查返回值是否为负，假设任何错误实际上意味着 VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL ，然后尝试创建新的描述符池。如果 VK_ERROR_FRAGMENTED_POOL 是实际的返回值，它将为该决定增加确定性。

trans-unit.source: As described below, host writes are not implicitly flushed when the memory object is unmapped, but the implementation must guarantee that writes that have not been flushed do not affect any other memory.
trans-unit.target: 如上所述下面，主机写入不隐式刷新，当内存对象是未映射，但实现必须保证写入还没有被刷新，不影响任何其他存储器。

trans-unit.source: As no operation to vkQueueBindSparse causes any pipeline stage to access memory, synchronization primitives used in this command effectively only define execution dependencies.
trans-unit.target: 由于对vkQueueBindSparse的任何操作都不会导致任何管道阶段访问内存，因此该命令中使用的同步原语仅有效地定义了执行依赖性。

trans-unit.source: As queries operate asynchronously, ending a query does not immediately set the query’s status to available. A query is considered finished when the final results of the query are ready to be retrieved by vkGetQueryPoolResults and vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults, and this is when the query’s status is set to available.
trans-unit.target: 由于查询是异步操作的，因此结束查询不会立即将查询的状态设置为可用。当查询的最终结果准备好由vkGetQueryPoolResults和vkCmdCopyQueryPoolResults检索时，即该查询的状态设置为可用时，该查询被视为完成。

trans-unit.source: As the sizes of the source and destination extents can differ in any dimension, texels in the source extent are scaled and filtered to the destination extent. Scaling occurs via the following operations:
trans-unit.target: 由于源范围和目标范围的大小在任何维度上都可以不同，因此源范围中的纹理像素会缩放并过滤到目标范围。通过以下操作进行缩放：

trans-unit.source: At least one heap must include VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT in VkMemoryHeap::flags. If there are multiple heaps that all have similar performance characteristics, they may all include VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT. In a unified memory architecture (UMA) system, there is often only a single memory heap which is considered to be equally “local” to the host and to the device, and such an implementation must advertise the heap as device-local.
trans-unit.target: 至少一个堆必须在VkMemoryHeap :: flags 中包含 VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT 。如果存在多个具有相似性能特征的堆，则它们可能都包含 VK_MEMORY_HEAP_DEVICE_LOCAL_BIT 。在统一内存体系结构（UMA）系统中，通常只有一个内存堆被视为对主机和设备同等地“本地”，并且这样的实现必须将该堆通告为设备本地的。

trans-unit.source: Attachments can also be cleared at the beginning of a render pass instance by setting loadOp (or stencilLoadOp) of VkAttachmentDescription to VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR, as described for vkCreateRenderPass.
trans-unit.target: 附件可以也可以在通过设置渲染过程实例的开头清除 loadOp （或 stencilLoadOp 的）VkAttachmentDescription到 VK_ATTACHMENT_LOAD_OP_CLEAR 作为描述，vkCreateRenderPass。

trans-unit.source: B = B<sub>d</sub> × D<sub>b</sub> - B<sub>s0</sub> × S<sub>b</sub>
trans-unit.target: B = B <sub>d</sub> ×D <sub>b</sub> -B <sub>s0</sub> ×S <sub>b</sub>

trans-unit.source: B = B<sub>s0</sub> × S<sub>b</sub> + B<sub>d</sub> × D<sub>b</sub>
trans-unit.target: B = B <sub>s0</sub> ×S <sub>b</sub> + B <sub>d</sub> ×D <sub>b</sub>

trans-unit.source: B = B<sub>s0</sub> × S<sub>b</sub> - B<sub>d</sub> × D<sub>b</sub>
trans-unit.target: B = B <sub>s0</sub> ×S <sub>b</sub> -B <sub>d</sub> ×D <sub>b</sub>

trans-unit.source: B = max(B<sub>s0</sub>,B<sub>d</sub>)
trans-unit.target: B =最大（B <sub>s0</sub>，B <sub>d</sub>）

trans-unit.source: B = min(B<sub>s0</sub>,B<sub>d</sub>)
trans-unit.target: B = min（B <sub>s0</sub>，B <sub>d</sub>）

trans-unit.source: Because depth or stencil aspect buffer to image copies may require format conversions on some implementations, they are not supported on queues that do not support graphics. When copying to a depth aspect, the data in buffer memory must be in the the range [0,1] or undefined results occur.
trans-unit.target: 因为在某些实现上，深度或模板纵横比缓冲区到图像副本可能需要格式转换，所以在不支持图形的队列中不支持它们。复制到深度方面时，缓冲存储器中的数据必须在[0,1]范围内，否则会发生未定义的结果。

trans-unit.source: Because the list of available layers may change externally between calls to vkEnumerateInstanceExtensionProperties, two calls may retrieve different results if a pLayerName is available in one call but not in another. The extensions supported by a layer may also change between two calls, e.g. if the layer implementation is replaced by a different version between those calls.
trans-unit.target: 因为在调用 vkEnumerateInstanceExtensionProperties 之间可用层的列表可能会在外部改变，所以如果 pLayerName 在一个调用中可用而在另一个调用中不可用，则两个调用可能会检索不同的结果。一层所支持的扩展也可以在两个调用之间更改，例如，如果该层实现被这些调用之间的不同版本代替。

trans-unit.source: Before freeing a memory object, an application must ensure the memory object is no longer in use by the device—​for example by command buffers queued for execution. The memory can remain bound to images or buffers at the time the memory object is freed, but any further use of them (on host or device) for anything other than destroying those objects will result in undefined behavior. If there are still any bound images or buffers, the memory may not be immediately released by the implementation, but must be released by the time all bound images and buffers have been destroyed. Once memory is released, it is returned to the heap from which it was allocated.
trans-unit.target: 在释放内存对象之前，应用程序必须确保设备不再使用该内存对象-例如通过排队等待执行的命令缓冲区。释放内存对象时，内存可以保持与图像或缓冲区的绑定，但是（销毁）这些对象（在主机或设备上）除销毁这些对象外，如果进一步使用它们，将导致未定义的行为。如果仍然有任何绑定的图像或缓冲区，则实现可能不会立即释放内存，但是必须在销毁所有绑定的图像和缓冲区时释放内存。释放内存后，会将其返回到分配内存的堆中。

trans-unit.source: Bitmasks are passed to many commands and structures to compactly represent options, but VkFlags is not used directly in the API. Instead, a Vk*Flags type which is an alias of VkFlags, and whose name matches the corresponding Vk*FlagBits that are valid for that type, is used. These aliases are described in the Flag Types appendix of the Specification.
trans-unit.target: 位掩码被传递给许多命令和结构以紧凑地表示选项，但是 VkFlags 并未直接在API中使用。而是使用 Vk*Flags 类型，该类型是 VkFlags 的别名，并且其名称与对该类型有效的相应 Vk*FlagBits 匹配。这些别名在规范的标志类型附录中进行了描述。

trans-unit.source: Certain access types are only performed by a subset of pipeline stages. Any synchronization command that takes both stage masks and access masks uses both to define the access scopes - only the specified access types performed by the specified stages are included in the access scope. An application must not specify an access flag in a synchronization command if it does not include a pipeline stage in the corresponding stage mask that is able to perform accesses of that type. The following table lists, for each access flag, which pipeline stages can perform that type of access.
trans-unit.target: 某些访问类型仅由管道阶段的子集执行。任何同时具有阶段掩码和访问掩码的同步命令均使用这两者来定义访问范围 - 访问范围仅包括由指定阶段执行的指定访问类型。一个应用程序必须如果它不包括在相应的阶段掩模能够执行该类型的存取流水线级未指定在同步命令的访问标志。下表针对每个访问标志列出了哪些管道阶段可以执行该类型的访问。

trans-unit.source: Command buffers are objects used to record commands which can be subsequently submitted to a device queue for execution. There are two levels of command buffers - primary command buffers, which can execute secondary command buffers, and which are submitted to queues, and secondary command buffers, which can be executed by primary command buffers, and which are not directly submitted to queues.
trans-unit.target: 命令缓冲区是用于记录命令的对象，这些命令可随后提交给设备队列以供执行。有两种级别的命令缓冲区- 主命令缓冲区（可以执行辅助命令缓冲区，并提交给队列）和辅助命令缓冲区（可以由主命令缓冲区执行，并且不直接提交给队列）。

trans-unit.source: Command buffers are represented by VkCommandBuffer handles:
trans-unit.target: 命令缓冲区由 VkCommandBuffer 句柄表示：

trans-unit.source: Command pools are opaque objects that command buffer memory is allocated from, and which allow the implementation to amortize the cost of resource creation across multiple command buffers. Command pools are externally synchronized, meaning that a command pool must not be used concurrently in multiple threads. That includes use via recording commands on any command buffers allocated from the pool, as well as operations that allocate, free, and reset command buffers or the pool itself.
trans-unit.target: 命令池是不透明的对象，从中分配了命令缓冲区内存，这些对象使实现可以分摊跨多个命令缓冲区的资源创建成本。命令池外部同步，这意味着一个命令池必须不能同时在多线程应用。这包括通过在从池中分配的任何命令缓冲区上记录命令来使用命令，以及分配，释放和重置命令缓冲区或池本身的操作。

trans-unit.target: 命令池由 VkCommandPool 句柄表示：

trans-unit.source: Due to allowable rounding errors in the generation of the source texture coordinates, it is not always possible to guarantee exactly which source texels will be sampled for a given blit. As rounding errors are implementation dependent, the exact results of a blitting operation are also implementation dependent.
trans-unit.target: 由于在生成源纹理坐标的过程中存在允许的四舍五入错误,因此并不总是能够保证在给定的掺杂中准确地对哪些源纹理进行采样。由于四舍五入的错误是依赖于实现的,所以掺杂操作的确切结果也依赖于实现。

trans-unit.source: During a render pass instance, input/color attachments with color formats that have a component size of 8, 16, or 32 bits must be represented in the attachment’s format throughout the instance. Attachments with other floating- or fixed-point color formats, or with depth components may be represented in a format with a precision higher than the attachment format, but must be represented with the same range. When such a component is loaded via the loadOp, it will be converted into an implementation-dependent format used by the render pass. Such components must be converted from the render pass format, to the format of the attachment, before they are resolved or stored at the end of a render pass instance via storeOp. Conversions occur as described in Numeric Representation and Computation and Fixed-Point Data Conversions.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染过程实例中，必须在整个实例中以附件格式表示组件尺寸为8位，16位或32位的颜色格式的输入/颜色附件。附件与其他浮点或固定点色彩格式，或与深度分量可以与精度比附件格式更高的格式来表示，但必须具有相同的范围来表示。当通过 loadOp 加载此类组件时，它将被转换为渲染过程使用的与实现相关的格式。在通过解析将这些组件解析或存储在渲染过程实例的末尾之前，必须将此类组件从渲染过程格式转换为附件的格式。 storeOp 。如数字表示和计算以及定点数据转换中所述进行转换。

trans-unit.source: During the resolve the samples corresponding to each pixel location in the source are converted to a single sample before being written to the destination. If the source formats are floating-point or normalized types, the sample values for each pixel are resolved in an implementation-dependent manner. If the source formats are integer types, a single sample’s value is selected for each pixel.
trans-unit.target: 在解析期间，与源中每个像素位置相对应的样本在写入目标之前会转换为单个样本。如果源格式是浮点型或规范化类型，则以与实现相关的方式解析每个像素的样本值。如果源格式是整数类型，则为每个像素选择单个样本的值。

trans-unit.source: Each of the pDescriptorSetsmust be compatible with the pipeline layout specified by layout. The layout used to program the bindings must also be compatible with the pipeline used in subsequent graphics or compute commands, as defined in the Pipeline Layout Compatibility section.
trans-unit.target: 每个的 pDescriptorSets 必须是由指定的管道布局兼容 layout 。用于绑定程序中的布局必须也与在随后的图形或计算命令中使用，如在所限定的管道兼容管线布置兼容性部分。

trans-unit.source: Each region in pRegions is copied from the source buffer to the same region of the destination buffer. srcBuffer and dstBuffercan be the same buffer or alias the same memory, but the result is undefined if the copy regions overlap in memory.
trans-unit.target: pRegions 中的每个区域都从源缓冲区复制到目标缓冲区的相同区域。 srcBuffer 和 dstBuffer 可以是相同的缓冲区，也可以是同一内存的别名，但是如果复制区域在内存中重叠，则结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: Each region in pRegions is copied from the source image to the same region of the destination image. srcImage and dstImagecan be the same image or alias the same memory.
trans-unit.target: pRegions 中的每个区域都从源图像复制到目标图像的相同区域。 srcImage 和 dstImage 可以是同一图像，也可以是同一内存的别名。

trans-unit.source: Each region in pRegions is copied from the specified region of the source buffer to the specified region of the destination image.
trans-unit.target: pRegions 中的每个区域都从源缓冲区的指定区域复制到目标图像的指定区域。

trans-unit.source: Each region in pRegions is copied from the specified region of the source image to the specified region of the destination buffer.
trans-unit.target: pRegions 中的每个区域都从源图像的指定区域复制到目标缓冲区的指定区域。

trans-unit.source: Each scissor rectangle is described by a VkRect2D structure, with the offset.x and offset.y values determining the upper left corner of the scissor rectangle, and the extent.width and extent.height values determining the size in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 每个剪刀矩形都由VkRect2D结构描述，其中 offset.x 和 offset.y 值确定剪刀矩形的左上角， extent.width 和 extent.height 值确定像素的大小。

trans-unit.source: Each specified range in pRanges is cleared to the value specified by pColor.
trans-unit.target: 将 pRanges 中的每个指定范围清除为 pColor 指定的值。

trans-unit.target: 每个顶点输入属性由 VkVertexInputAttributeDescription 结构的实例指定。

trans-unit.source: Events are a synchronization primitive that can be used to insert a fine-grained dependency between commands submitted to the same queue, or between the host and a queue. Events have two states - signaled and unsignaled. An application can signal an event, or unsignal it, on either the host or the device. A device can wait for an event to become signaled before executing further operations. No command exists to wait for an event to become signaled on the host, but the current state of an event can be queried.
trans-unit.target: 事件是一个同步原语，可用于在提交到同一队列的命令之间或主机与队列之间插入细粒度的依赖关系。事件具有两种状态-发出信号和未发出信号。应用程序可以在主机或设备上发出信号或取消信号。设备可以在执行进一步的操作之前等待事件被通知。没有命令可以等待事件在主机上发出信号，但是可以查询事件的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: Events are represented by VkEvent handles:
trans-unit.target: 事件由 VkEvent 句柄表示：

trans-unit.source: Every input attachment used by the current subpass must be bound to the pipeline via a descriptor set
trans-unit.target: 当前子通道使用的每个输入附件都必须通过描述符集绑定到管道

trans-unit.target: Failure

trans-unit.source: Fence and semaphore operations submitted with vkQueueSubmit have additional ordering constraints compared to other submission commands, with dependencies involving previous and subsequent queue operations. Information about these additional constraints can be found in the semaphore and fence sections of the synchronization chapter.
trans-unit.target: 与其他提交命令相比，使用vkQueueSubmit提交的围栅和信号量操作具有其他排序约束，其依赖性涉及先前和后续的队列操作。有关这些附加约束的信息，请参见“同步”一章的“ 信号量”和“ fence”部分。

trans-unit.source: Fences are a synchronization primitive that can be used to insert a dependency from a queue to the host. Fences have two states - signaled and unsignaled. A fence can be signaled as part of the execution of a queue submission command. Fences can be unsignaled on the host with vkResetFences. Fences can be waited on by the host with the vkWaitForFences command, and the current state can be queried with vkGetFenceStatus.
trans-unit.target: 栅栏是一个同步原语，可用于将依赖项从队列插入到主机。栅栏有两种状态-信号状态和未信号状态。可以在执行队列提交命令时用信号通知篱笆。可以使用vkResetFences在主机上取消对栅栏的信号。栅栏可以由主机上等待与vkWaitForFences命令，并且当前状态可以与被查询vkGetFenceStatus。

trans-unit.source: Fences are represented by VkFence handles:
trans-unit.target: 栅栏由 VkFence 句柄表示：

trans-unit.source: For all bitmasks of VkSampleCountFlagBits, the sample count limits defined above represent the minimum supported sample counts for each image type. Individual images may support additional sample counts, which are queried using vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties as described in Supported Sample Counts.
trans-unit.target: 对于VkSampleCountFlagBits的所有位掩码，上面定义的样本数限制表示每种图像类型支持的最小样本数。单个图像可能支持其他样本计数，如支持的样本计数中所述，可以使用vkGetPhysicalDeviceImageFormatProperties查询这些样本。

trans-unit.source: For any element of pDependencies, if the dstSubpass is not VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL, all stage flags included in the dstStageMask member of that dependency must be a pipeline stage supported by the pipeline identified by the pipelineBindPoint member of the source subpass.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何元件 pDependencies ，如果 dstSubpass 不 VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL ，包括在所有阶段标志 dstStageMask 该依赖性的部件必须是由所述支撑的流水线级管道由所识别 pipelineBindPoint 源subpass的构件。

trans-unit.source: For any element of pDependencies, if the srcSubpass is not VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL, all stage flags included in the srcStageMask member of that dependency must be a pipeline stage supported by the pipeline identified by the pipelineBindPoint member of the source subpass.
trans-unit.target: 对于任何元件 pDependencies ，如果 srcSubpass 不 VK_SUBPASS_EXTERNAL ，包括在所有阶段标志 srcStageMask 该依赖性的部件必须是由所述支撑的流水线级管道由所识别 pipelineBindPoint 源subpass的构件。

trans-unit.target: 对于 pBinds 的任何给定元素，如果该元素的 flags 成员包含 VK_SPARSE_MEMORY_BIND_METADATA_BIT ，则定义的绑定范围必须在 image 的元数据方面的尾巴区域内
